original: Bohrok gro-Kal's journal
string: 博洛克-格-卡尔的日记

original:
Time flies... Has it really been 26 years since I lost my last job already?

I remember how scared I was from the moment I started running. Man, was I eager to change the world before that day! After that... I gave up. I left my armor, my name, and my honor behind. I only kept my sword. I can already hear my boss yelling, "Get rid of it, you idiot!". 
I just couldn't. This sword is the last vestige of my identity. I can't get rid of it.

Why do I bring this up all of the sudden? Well, a few days ago I met this stray breton lad in Solitude who had just ran away from home. I suppose I saw myself in him, though instead of running away out of despair, he seeks hope.

So yeah, I took him under my wing. He's like the little brother I never had, and I guess I'm like the supportive paternal figure he never had. I know it's dangerous for him to be around, but I need to stop betraying myself. I need someone to pass down my teachings. Someone who can help me make a difference!

Around the same time, a corrupt guard came to me with a job offer. Apparently he stole something from the Jarl and he wants me to act as his bodyguard while he recieves the ransom. Supposedly he'll pay me 2000 Septims and 800 to the lad.

Can't say I'm proud of this job, even if it's not the worst I've done (by far), but I don't think I'll get a better oportunity to get enough gold to leave Skyrim legally. I've been trapped here for half a decade. If this goes sideways, we can just fight our way through or make a run for it.

After that, no more masks. No more immoral jobs. We'll head to Hammerfel and take the fight to them!
Talos, preserve us.
string:
时光飞逝……距离我丢掉上一份差事，竟已过去二十六年了？

至今仍记得开始逃亡那刻的恐慌。呵，在那天之前我还满心想着改变世界！自那以后……我放弃了。抛下了铠甲、名姓与荣耀，只留了佩剑。耳边仿佛又响起首领的怒吼：“把这破铜烂铁扔了，蠢货！”
可我做不到。这柄剑是我存在过的最后证明。

为何突然提起往事？是因为前几日在独孤城遇见个离家出走的布莱顿少年。或许我从他身上看到了自己，只不过他奔向的是希望而非绝望。

于是收养了这小子。他像我不曾拥有的幼弟，我大概也算他缺失的父辈缩影。明知留他在身边危险，但我不能再背叛本心。总该有人继承我的技艺，有人与我共同扭转这世道！

恰在此时，有个贪赃舞弊的卫兵找上门。据说他偷了领主的宝物，想让我当保镖保护他收赎金。许诺给我两千赛普汀，那孩子也能拿八百。

谈不上光彩的差事——虽然比我干过的勾当干净得多，但这是攒够钱合法离开天际省的最佳时机。我已在此困守五年。若生变故，大不了杀出条血路。

事成之后，永别面具，永不接黑活。我们要直奔落锤省，把战火烧到他们家门口！
塔洛斯保佑我们。

original: Wait. I need to ask you something.
string: 等一下，我有些事要问你。

original: You had a wound in your hand earlier, didn't you?
string: 你的手之前受伤了，对吧？

original: Yes, your sarcophagus pierced it when I pressed the button.
string: 是的，我按下按钮的时候，被石棺划破了。

original: Now everything makes sense. I shouldn't feel so energetic after not feeding for so long.
string: 现在一切都说得通了。我不该在这么久没进食后，还感觉精力充沛。

original: The sarcophagus absorbed the blood you lost and nourished me with it. Even if it was just a little, it was enough to revitalize me for a while.
string: 石棺吸收了你流出的血液，并用它滋养我。哪怕只是一点点，也足够我恢复些精神了。

original: However... I haven't fed in what feels like ages. I didn't notice how weak I was earlier, but now that I've stretched my legs...
string: 不过……我感觉我已经很久没有进食了。之前还没啥感觉，但现在手脚都活动开后……

original: Look, this is awkward. You can guess where this is going, can't you?
string: 嗯，这有点尴尬。但你应该能猜到的，对吧？

original: You're seriously asking me to let you feed on my blood?
string: 你是认真的？你要吸我的血？

original: Just... Listen. I'm not trying to abuse your kindness, okay? You're already doing me a huge favor.
string: 啊……听我说，我不是想利用你的好意，好吗？你已经帮了我很大的忙了。

original: I just need something to get by for today, but I'll understand if you refuse. If there's no way around it, I can wait until I get home.
string: 我只是需要点东西撑过今天，但如果你拒绝我能理解。要是没别的办法，我能忍到回家的。

original: You'd just have to bite me? Right here?
string: 所以你得咬我是吗？就直接咬上来？

original: No, that... It might hurt if you're conscious, and if I'm not careful, I may end up infecting you. You'd have to be perfectly still.
string: 不行，那太……要是你醒着的话会很疼的。而且如果我一不小心，还会让你感染。你必须保持完全不动才行。

original: I think it's best to do this the old-fashioned way. If you fall asleep, I might be able to do this without inflicting you pain.
string: 我觉得最好还是用传统的方式吧。要是睡着了，你大概不会感到痛的。

original: It would certainly make things easier for me too.
string: 这样也确实能让我方便些。

original: No, that... It might hurt if you're conscious. You'd have to be perfectly still.
string: 不行，那太……要是你醒着的话会很疼的。你必须保持完全不动才行。

original: I think it's best to do this the old-fashioned way. If you fall asleep, I might be able to do this without inflicting you pain.
string: 我觉得最好还是用传统的方式吧。要是睡着了，你大概不会感到痛的。

original: It would certainly make things easier for me too.
string: 这样也确实能让我方便些。

original: You know, if you didn't want me to feed on your blood, you could have just said so.
string: 其实，如果你不愿意让我吸血，直接说就好了。

original: Dammit... I was hoping he'd gone to Solitude.
string: 该死……我原以为他去独孤城了。

original: Dammit... I was hoping he'd gone to Solitude.
string: 该死……我原以为他去独孤城了。

original: Why?
string: 为什么？

original: What? Oh, sorry. I was just thinking out loud.
string: 什么？哦，抱歉，我方才在自言自语。

original: Forget I said anything. Let's catch up with the priest before we lose track of him.
string: 当我什么都没说吧。趁还能跟上，我们得追上那位祭司。

original: You said something about Solitude earlier. Did you want to go there?
string: 刚才你提到独孤城……是打算去那儿吗？

original: Well... To be honest, yes. I was planning to visit it.
string: 嗯……老实说，是的。我本计划去看看。

original: Not just a quick glance, mind you. I mean taking my time exploring the city. See the points of interest and all that.
string: 可别以为是匆匆一瞥。我是想好好游览这座城市，看看那些名胜古迹之类的。

original: Well... To be honest, yes. I was planning to visit it.
string: 嗯……老实说，是的。我本计划去看看。

original: Not just a quick glance, mind you. I mean taking my time exploring the city. See the points of interest and all that.
string: 可别以为是匆匆一瞥。我是想好好游览这座城市，看看那些名胜古迹之类的。

original: You never got the chance to do so before?
string: 你以前一直没机会这样做吗？

original: Not really. I was going to say I've been wanting to for "a while", but I'd have to take those few extra centuries I was locked away into account.
string: 没有。我本来想说这念头酝酿了“好一阵子”了，可我得把被囚禁的千百年也算进去才行。

original: I didn't get to leave the castle at all during most of my life, and the few times I could, it was just for brief, tightly controlled visits.
string: 我大半生都没能踏出城堡半步，仅有的几次外出也都是短暂且受严密监控的行程。

original: So my only way of experiencing the outside world was through the distant view of Solitude over the mountains. I could only wonder what it was like.
string: 因此，我唯一能接触外界的方式，便是隔着群山遥望独孤城的景致。我只能凭空想象那里的模样。

original: Well, our mission is complete. We have some time to spare.
string: 好了，任务完成了。我们还有些富余时间。

original: Hm... You know what? You have a point. I wouldn't mind taking a little detour.
string: 嗯……  你猜怎么着？你说得有道理。我不介意稍微绕个路。

original: But you don't have to come if you don't feel like it. I don't want to go knowing I'm dragging you into something you don't want to do.
string: 但如果你不想去，不必勉强自己。我不愿强人所难。

original: It's fine. You could use a guide, and I need to relax anyway.
string: 没事的。你需要个向导，而我也正好想放松一下。

original: Very well, then. I'll follow your lead.
string: 好吧，那就这样吧。我听你的。

original: Here we are. What do you want to do?
string: 我们到了。你想做什么？

original: Ugh... I don't know why, but I had a feeling you'd bring me here without a plan.
string: 呃……不知为何，我就觉得你会这样毫无计划地带我来这儿。

original: Well, I guess we could start with the windmill. Heard it's one of the city's main attractions.
string: 好吧，要不先去看看风车？听说那是城里最出名的景观之一。

original: But you better come up with a plan afterwards.
string: 不过之后你可得好好规划一下。

original: Wow! The views up here are incredible!
string: 哇！这里的的景色真是太美了！

original: I didn't expect the bridge to be so high! You can almost see the whole province from here.
string: 真没想到这座桥这么高！几乎能俯瞰整个省的景色。

original: If not for that building on the other side, we might be able to see the castle from here as well.
string: 要不是对岸那座建筑挡着，说不定从这儿也能望见那座城堡呢。

original: I'm impressed myself. Even the College can be seen from here!
string: 连我自己都感到惊讶。从这儿居然还能看见学院！

original: You're right! And if we scoot a bit further to the bridge, we may even be able to see Morthal.
string: 没错！要是我们再往桥那边挪几步，说不定还能看见莫萨尔呢。

original: Okay, we're off to a good start. What's our next point of interest?
string: 好的，我们开了个好头。接下来要看什么景点？

original: Should we continue with the Bards College?
string: 要不要接着去吟游诗人学院看看？

original: Can't say I'm a bard enthusiast, but I don't want to be so closed-minded now that you've given me this chance. Lead the way.
string: 虽说我算不上吟游诗人的狂热爱好者，但既然你给我这个机会，我也不该太固执。带路吧。

original: Here we are. Wanna take a look inside?
string: 我们到了。要进去看看吗？

original: Um... No. I'm not really that curious about the building. Looks like every other house in this city.
string: 嗯……不用了。我对这栋建筑实在提不起兴趣，外观和城里其他房子没什么两样。

original: Honestly, the only thing that piques my interest is the balcony over there.
string: 老实说，唯一让我感兴趣的是那边那个露台。

original: You said you weren't a bard enthusiast. Why is that?
string: 你刚才说你不是吟游诗人的爱好者。为什么这么说？

original: Oh, don't get me wrong! I know bards are held in high regard in Skyrim for a good reason. I never meant to disrespect their craft.
string: 哦，别误会！我知道吟游诗人在天际备受尊敬是有原因的。我绝不是要轻视他们的技艺。

original: It's just that... I guess you could call it exhaustion?
string: 只是……大概可以说是疲倦吧？

original: Exhaustion from what?
string: 疲倦来自何处？

original: How could I explain...?
string: 我该怎么说呢……？

original: When you're the daughter of a powerful ruler, many nobles see you as an opportunity to be part of that power.
string: 身为权势统治者的女儿，许多贵族都会视你为攀附权势的契机。

original: And next thing you know, they send their sons to impress you. All of which, by the way, believe that poetry will earn your heart.
string: 转眼间，他们就派儿子来讨好你。说来也巧，这些公子全都以为写几首诗就能俘获芳心。

original: One bard, it's cute. Five bards, it's okay. Ten bards, it gets repetitive. Twenty bards, it gets annoying.
string: 一个吟游诗人还算可爱，五个也还行，十个就开始重复，二十个简直让人烦不胜烦。

original: You can see why I'd lose interest in their craft. And I think that's the earliest memory I can think of! Imagine how awkward the experience was.
string: 现在你该明白为什么我对他们的技艺提不起兴趣了吧。而且这还是我能回想起来最早的记忆！想象一下当时有多尴尬。

original: Look, let's just forget about that. Where are we going next?
string: 算了，不提这个了。接下来我们去哪儿？

original: We could go to the market. You want a souvenir?
string: 我们可以去市场看看。要带点纪念品回去吗？

original: Yeah, that actually sounds nice! I'd like to buy some jewelry. Maybe they have some in a clothing store?
string: 这主意确实不错！我想买些首饰。服装店里会有卖的吗？

original: Don't worry, I can pay for it myself. I brought a good sum of money from the castle.
string: 别担心，我能自己付钱。从城堡出来时带了不少钱呢。

original: Did you take care of what I asked?
string: 你处理好我交代的事了吗？

original: Yes, thank you. Do you sell jewelry here?
string: 嗯，多谢。请问这里卖首饰吗？

original: Why, of course! We specialize in clothing, but we have a decent selection of circlets and rings imported directly from Alinor.
string: 当然有！我们主营服饰，但也备有不少直接从艾琳诺进口的头环与戒指。

original: Please, have a browse. Take your time, and don't hesitate to ask for my opinion.
string: 请随意浏览。慢慢看，有任何疑问随时欢迎提出。

original: She's going to need it...
string: 她会需要这个的……

original: How much would that circlet cost?
string: 这个头环要多少钱？

original: Ahh, an excellent choice. Few can appreciate the glamorous combination of ebony and ruby.
string: 啊，绝佳的选择。鲜有人懂得欣赏黑檀与红宝石交相辉映的搭配。

original: By which she means that it's been sitting on our display desk for three years.
string: 她的意思是这物件在展台上已经搁了整整三年。

original: A-as I was saying, I am willing to part from it for merely 400 gold.
string: 就……就像我刚说的，我愿以四百金币的价格割舍。

original: Of course! Here you go.
string: 当然！给你。

original: What is this supposed to be?
string: 这到底是什么？

original: Um... 400 gold?
Look, dear. If you plan on buying quality adornments, at least have the decency of bringing Septims with you.
string: 听我说，亲爱的。如果你想买上等饰品，至少带够塞普汀再来，这才是最起码的体面。

original: Septims?
string: 塞普汀？

original: Please, excuse me.
string: 抱歉，打扰了。

original: Do you sell jewelry? My friend would like to buy some.
string: 请问你们这儿卖首饰吗？我朋友想买几件。

original: Does she now? Let me talk to her, then.
string: 她现在吗？那请让我跟她谈谈。

original: I do sell jewelry, yes. But as you might have guessed, I'm on my break time. Meet me back in my shop when I have the energy to deal with you.
string: 没错，我确实卖首饰。但你也看到了，现在是我的休息时间。等我恢复精力能应付时，再来店里找我吧。

original: Do you sell jewelry?
string: 请问你们这儿卖首饰吗？

original: Can I help you, young lady?
string: 有什么能帮你的吗，小姐？

original: What in Oblivion is a Septim?
string: 塞普汀到底是什么？

original: You mean the coin or the imperial dynasty of the Third Era?
string: 你问的是塞普汀钱币，还是第三纪元时期的帝国王朝？

original: Ugh... Never mind, I know what's going on here.
string: 唉……算了，我明白这里是怎么回事了。

original: What's with monarchs wanting to put their faces on every form of currency? Now the coins I brought are useless!
string: 君主们为什么总想把自己的脸印在各种货币上？现在我带来的钱币全废了！

original: You want me to pay for that?
string: 你想让我来付钱？

original: No. I've had enough stuff handed to me on a silver platter. For once in my life, I want to earn something.
string: 不。我受够了别人把东西奉上银盘。这辈子总该有一次，我想靠自己挣来想要的东西。

original: So the first order of business is to earn 400 of these "Septims". Any ideas?
string: 那么当务之急就是赚够400枚这种“塞普汀”了。有什么好主意吗？

original: I guess I could sell some of the junk I'm carrying...
string: 或许我可以卖掉我随身带的这些杂物……

original: No! I just told you, I want to earn this. You don't have to make sacrifices.
string: 不行！我刚说过，我想靠自己去挣。你不必付出牺牲。

original: I do appreciate it, but I'd rather try other ideas first.
string: 你的好意我心领了，但我想先试试其他办法。

original: Chopping wood non-stop should yield results... Eventually.
string: 持续不断地劈柴应该能见效……迟早会。

original: In a hundred years, maybe.
string: 一百年，或许吧。

original: Any other ideas?
string: 还有别的想法吗？

original: Raid a dungeon! Never fails to fill your pockets.
string: 去地下城探险！永远能让你满载而归。

original: I've spent enough time underground, thank you very much.
string: 我已经在地下待得够久了，多谢好意。

original: Any other ideas?
string: 还有别的想法吗？

original: Well, if you have quick fingers, we could find a careless passerby and...
string: 要是你手快的话，我们可以找个粗心的路人然后……

original: And get a bounty on our heads, genius! Let's not include the city jail as part of the tour, okay?
string: 然后我们头上就会挂赏金，天才！可别把城里的监狱也列进行程单，好吗？

original: Any other ideas?
string: 还有别的想法吗？

original: We could sell your Elder Scroll, then steal it back?
string: 我们可以卖掉你的上古卷轴，再偷回来？

original: You know, if father finds out you even suggested that idea, he'll put your head on display in the castle's main hall.
string: 你知道吗，要是父亲知道你出了这种主意，他会把你的脑袋挂在城堡大厅里示众。

original: Any other ideas?
string: 还有别的想法吗？

original: The second we rid ourselves of this scroll we'll NEVER see it again. And I'd rather not give your boss any more reasons to kill me.
string: 一旦我们把这卷轴脱手，就再也别想找回来了。而且我可不想给你的老板更多杀我的理由。

original: Any other ideas?
string: 还有别的想法吗？

original: We could ask the Jarl for work.
string: 我们可以向领主讨份差事。

original: Bounty hunting, huh? I suppose it's the fastest way to earn our pay. Maybe not the easiest, but I'm in. Let's go.
string: 赏金猎人？这大概是赚钱最快的门路了。或许不算最轻松，但我加入。出发吧。

original: I'm not gonna lie. This palace is making me a little jealous. I wish my castle was this colorful.
string: 说真的，这座宫殿让我有点嫉妒。真希望我的城堡也能这么绚丽多彩。

original: Really? I thought you'd like dark, scary places better.
string: 真的吗？我还以为你更喜欢阴暗幽怖的地方呢。

original: Just because I'm more comfortable in the dark doesn't mean I don't like seeing some light in my life.
string: 虽然我在黑暗里更自在，但也不代表我不想感受生活中的光亮。

original: Honestly, I think spending so much time in the dark ends up affecting your psyche. I know that's not exactly an option for vampires, but...
string: 说实话，我觉得长期待在黑暗环境终究会影响心态。虽然这对吸血鬼来说确实身不由己，不过……

original: Is that why you like exploring?
string: 这就是你喜欢四处探险的原因吗？

original: I guess it's part of the reason. The sun bothers me, of course, but I believe it will do me some good to experience life as normal people do.
string: 算是一部分原因吧。虽然阳光让我不适，但我觉得体验普通人的生活对我有好处。

original: And honestly, it's worth the trouble. Even the idea of having a job feels kind of exciting!
string: 说实话，这点麻烦值得。就连打工这件事都让我觉得挺新鲜的！

original: With that being said, let's talk to the jarl.
string: 既然这样，我们就去找领主谈谈吧。

original: We're looking for a job. Got anything for us?
string: 我们在找工作。有什么差事能派给我们吗？

original: You'll have to talk to my steward for that.
string: 这事你得找我的总管谈。

original: Wait! There is... Something you could do for me. A personal matter I'd rather we kept between us. I can pay you both handsomely.
string: 等等……有件事或许你们能帮忙。是件私事，最好只有我们知晓。我会重金酬谢你们。

original: That's why we're here. What do you need?
string: 我们就是为此而来的。你需要什么？

original: A few nights ago, a thief broke into my quarters. He only took one item of a very sentimental value to me, and left a letter in its place.
string: 几晚前有个窃贼溜进我房间，只偷走一件对我意义非凡的物件，还留下了这封信。

original: In said letter he specified that if I didn't agree to his demands, which are outrageous to say the least, he'd reveal what he found to the public.
string: 他在信中明确表示，如果我不答应他那些极其无理的要求，他就把发现的东西公之于众。

original: You're not going to ask your guards for help?
string: 你不打算让卫兵协助调查吗？

original: What the thief took isn't a mere jewel or trophy. It's a scroll my late husband, High King Torygg, wrote not long before he was murdered.
string: 那窃贼盗走的并非寻常珠宝或战利品，是我亡夫托伊格先王遇害前亲笔书写的手稿。

original: Its contents carry very sensitive information that could stain his legacy. I can't let it fall in the hands of the wrong people!
string: 手稿内容涉及敏感信息，会玷污他的身后名。我绝不能让它落入歹人之手！

original: The thief gave me a week to agree to his demands, and if he learns that I involved the guard or my staff in this he'll fulfill his threat.
string: 窃贼给我一周时间同意他的要求，若让他发现我动用卫兵或下属插手此事，他必将兑现威胁。

original: You two seem like capable fighters. I need you to pose as my envoys and meet him at Kilkreath temple west of here, then make him pay.
string: 你们二位的身手看来定能胜任。我需要你们假扮我的使者，前往西边的基尔克瑞斯神庙与他会面，然后让他付出代价。

original: He gave you his location? That doesn't seem smart.
string: 他把他的位置告诉了你？这似乎不太明智。

original: There's a chance he won't be alone, and I have a feeling he could be a member of the palace staff. There's no way he'd found the scroll otherwise.
string: 他可能并非独自前来，而且我觉得他很可能是宫廷内部人员。否则他不可能找到那卷手稿。

original: What he's done is unforgivable! I won't reward him for disrespecting my husband's legacy! Please, retrieve the scroll for me.
string: 他的所作所为不可饶恕！我绝不会奖赏一个亵渎我丈夫遗物的人！请帮我把手稿找回来。

original: Alright. We will.
string: 好。我们会的。

original: I can't thank you enough, citizen! But I suppose that a substantial reward should suffice. And please, be careful.
string: 公民，我感激之情难以言表！不过一笔丰厚的酬金应该足够表达心意了。请务必当心。

original: Yes, but I'm a vampire too, remember? How are you supposed to feed on my blood?
string: 是的，但我也是吸血鬼啊，记得吗？你要怎么吸取我的血呢？

original: Yeah, I... Let's just say I'm a purer breed. Vampires like myself can cannibalize those who contracted the disease.
string: 啊，我……这么说吧，像我这样血统更纯正的吸血鬼，是能吞噬那些仅是感染了疾病的血族的。

original: It's not the same as feeding on a mortal, but your blood could help me regain some of my strength back.
string: 虽然这和吸普通人的血不大一样，但你的血也能帮我恢复些力气。

original: And you won't drain me to death while I let my guard down?
string: 你该不会趁我放松警戒，就把我吸干吧？

original: Yeah, I guess it's hard to trust a vampire to restrain herself, is it?
string: 是啊，指望一个吸血鬼能克制住自己，很难以置信，对吧？

original: Look, if I survived this long without feeding, I can hold on just a little longer, but it's taking its toll on me.
string: 听着，既然我这么久不进食都撑过来了，再多忍一会儿也没问题。但我已经快到极限了。

original: I'm only asking this as a favor. If I wanted to betray you I could have done it as soon as you turned your back on me.
string: 我这么问都是出于好意。要是我真想背叛你，在你转身的时候我就可以这么做了。

original: I don't want you to take pity on me, and I can't give you anything in return either.
string: 我不需要你可怜我，我也给不了你任何回报。

original: But I swear I don't want to hurt you.
string: 但我发誓我没想过要伤害你。

original: No. Sorry, but this is too much to ask.
string: 不行，抱歉，这个要求实在有点强人所难。

original: I understand. But thank you for listening anyway.
string: 我明白，不过还是谢谢你愿意听我说。

original: I'll try to keep up with you, but I won't be able to hold my own if we're attacked. I hope you can do the heavy lifting for us.
string: 我会尽量跟上你的，但如果遇到袭击，我可能就帮不上什么忙了。只能劳烦你能多担待些了。

original: Fine... Let me find a safe location to do this.
string: 好的……让我先找个安全的地方吧。

original: Thank you for understanding.
string: 谢谢你的理解。

original: I'll let you choose the place. Once you lay down, I'll wait until you fall asleep. You won't notice anything. I promise.
string: 地点由你来选。等你躺下之后，我会守到你睡着。你不会感到任何不适的，我保证。

original: You're awake? How do you feel?
string: 你醒了？感觉如何？

original: Where...? The blood...
string: 这是哪……？血……

original: Don't make sudden movements! You just lost a bit of blood. You'll feel weakened for a day, at least. You should eat something.
string: 别乱动！你只是失了点血，至少会虚弱一整天，吃点东西吧。

original: Oh, right. You just bit me.
string: 哦，对，你刚刚咬了我。

original: Yeah. It's been ages since I last fed. It feels good.
string: 是啊，我已经很久没进食了。这种感觉真好。

original: I really appreciate what you did for me here. I won't forget it.
string: 我真的很感激你为我做的一切，我不会忘记的。

original: Are you alright?
string: 你还好吗？

original: Me? Yeah, better than ever. I just told you.
string: 我？是啊，我从没这么好过。我刚刚告诉过你了。

original: I mean... I did feel a bit uncomfortable. This is the first time I've ever bitten someone. I usually feed on blood potions.
string: 我是说……我确实有点不习惯。这是我第一次咬人，平常我都是喝血药剂的。

original: Wait, what? Why?
string: 等等，哈？为什么？

original: I don't like getting too close to people. Let's just leave it at that.
string: 我不怎么和人走得太近。就是这样。

original: Anyway, take your time to recover. I have been revitalized, so if we're attacked, I can do most of the heavy lifting. Don't push yourself.
string: 总之，你慢慢休息，我现在的精力很充沛，要是遇到袭击，就交给我来对付，你别勉强。

original: Also, if we could travel at nighttime, you'd be doing me another huge favor.
string: 另外，如果能选在夜里赶路，可就算帮了我大忙。

original: Did Jarl Elisif send you?
string: 是艾利西弗领主派你们来的？

original: I didn't know the Jarl was a widow. Do you know what happened to her husband?
string: 我原先不知道领主是一位遗孀。你知道她丈夫遭遇了什么变故吗？

original: I don't know much about it, but they say he was slain by Ulfric.
string: 我不太了解详情，但据说是被乌弗瑞克杀害的。

original: So that's what sparked the civil war, is it?
string: 所以这就引发了内战，对吧？

original: Thanks. I just wanted to be up-to-date. Come on, let's find that thief.
string: 多谢。我只是想了解最新情况。走吧，我们去找那个小偷。

original: Ulfric murdered him using the power of the Shout.
string: 乌弗瑞克是用龙吼力量杀害他的。

original: So that's what sparked the civil war, is it?
string: 所以这就引发了内战，对吧？

original: Thanks. I just wanted to be up-to-date. Come on, let's find that thief.
string: 多谢。我只是想了解最新情况。走吧，我们去找那个小偷。

original: Ulfric challenged him to single combat and killed him.
string: 乌弗瑞克通过决斗挑战杀死了他。

original: So that's what sparked the civil war, is it?
string: 所以这就引发了内战，对吧？

original: Thanks. I just wanted to be up-to-date. Come on, let's find that thief.
string: 多谢。我只是想了解最新情况。走吧，我们去找那个小偷。

original: Wait, aren't you a Solitude guard?
string: 等等，你不是独孤城的守卫吗？

original: I won't ask again. Were you sent here by Jarl Elisif?
string: 我不会再问第二遍。是不是艾利西弗领主派你们来的？

original: So you're the one who stole Torygg's scroll!
string: 原来是你偷走了托依格的手稿！

original: I suppose that answers my question. Yes, it was me, genius! Having a post in the Jarl's palace has its benefits, you see.
string: 看来我的疑问有答案了。没错，就是我，聪明人！在领主宫殿当差总有些便利，你懂的。

original: She didn't do a good job at hiding it, anyway. If she was smart, she would have destroyed it long ago. Imagine if a Stormcloak found this.
string: 她根本就没藏好这手稿。要是够聪明的话，早就该把它销毁了。想象一下要是风暴斗篷的人找到这个……

original: What do the Stormcloaks have to do with this?
string: 风暴斗篷和这件事有什么关系？

original: The scroll is actually a letter to Ulfric Stormcloak himself. He wanted to hold a meeting to discuss the future of Skyrim. Seemed fond of the guy.
string: 那卷轴其实是写给乌弗瑞克·风暴斗篷本人的信。他想召开会议讨论天际的未来，看起来对那个家伙颇有好感呢。

original: But that's not my problem. Soon, me and my boys will leave this war-torn craphole behind and live the good life in High Rock!
string: 不过这跟我没关系。很快我就能带着弟兄们离开这战火纷扬的鬼地方，去高岩过好日子了！

original: You can read the scroll yourself for all I care. Assuming you brought the ransom I demanded to the Jarl, of course.
string: 你大可以自己看个明白，反正我不在乎。当然，前提是你带了我向领主索求的赎金。

original: No. We're here to retrieve it. It's up to you how we do it.
string: 不，我们是来取回卷轴的。用哪种方式取，由你来决定。

original: Nocturnal's Cowl! She really IS the dumbest Jarl in all of Skyrim!
string: 诺克图娜尔的面具啊！她果真是整个天际最蠢的领主！

original: Ugh... That's fine! I'm sure Ulfric's loyalists will pay good money for this trash!
string: 哼……无所谓！我敢说乌弗瑞克的拥护者会很乐意花钱买下这废纸！

original: She brought this upon herself! May your deaths weigh on her conscience! To arms!
string: 这是她自找的！愿你们的死成为她良心的重负！动手！

original: Tough luck, thief! We're here to do your job!
string: 算你倒霉，小偷！我们可是来接手你的活儿的！

original: Oh, you want my guard badge, smartass? I'll gladly bury it with your bodies! Kill them!
string: 想要我的守卫徽章吗，自作聪明的家伙？我很乐意把它和你们的尸体一起埋了！杀了他们！

original: Only if you hand over the scroll first. (persuade)
string: 除非你先把卷轴交出来。（说服）

original: Ehhhhh, heh heh heh! Not falling for that, ice brain.
string: 呃——，呵呵呵！别想骗我，冰脑袋。

original: I won't ask again!
string: 我不会再问了！

original: Fine. Here you go. Now give me my money!
string: 好吧，给你。现在把钱给我！

original: Wait, that worked?
string: 等等，这就行了？

original: Wait a minute!
string: 等等！

original: Sure. Just get closer. I'll show you. (stab him)
string: 当然。你靠近点，我拿给你看。（捅他）

original: That's right! Come to papa--
string: 这就对了！快到爸爸这来——

original: Um... Should we attack them?
string: 呃……我们该攻击他们吗？

original: Nahhh. Let's just leave. This fight ain't worth dying for.
string: 算了。咱们走吧。这场争斗不值得送命。

original: I guess you're the smart one, huh?
string: 看来你才是明白人，对吧？

original: Obviously. But me? "Ohhh, I want to see the world and live adventures". Look where that got me!
string: 那是自然。可我呢？“哦哦，我想环游世界体验冒险生活”。看看这给我带来了什么！

original: Should have listened to my parents and studied medicine...
string: 早该听父母的话学医的……

original: What do they know? You're a free spirit! You just didn't find the right adventure.
string: 他们懂什么？你可是自由的灵魂！只是还没遇上真正的冒险罢了。

original: Thanks. Love ya, man.
string: 谢了。爱你，兄弟。

original: Love ya too, buddy!
string: 我也爱你，老兄！

original: Well, today is the beginning of the rest of your life! Let's find that adventure together!
string: 那么，今天就是你余生的起点！咱们一起去寻找冒险吧！

original: Well, I'd say that's mission accomplished.
string: 嗯，我觉得这算是任务完成了。

original: Do you mind if I'm the one who delivers it to her? We got into this job at my behest, so...
string: 你介意由我来把东西交给她吗？毕竟，当初是我提议接下这活儿的，所以……

original: Sure. Here you go.
string: 当然，给你。

original: Thanks. Let's go back to Solitude.
string: 谢了。我们回独孤城吧。

original: You think he was telling the truth? Torygg wanted to support Ulfric?
string: 你觉得他说的都是实话吗？托依格真想支持乌弗瑞克？

original: We shouldn't talk about this. Not on her back. We can confront her about it later, but now we should complete our job.
string: 我们不该谈论这个，尤其是在她背后。之后我们可以当面跟她对质，但现在我们应该先完成任务。

original: We've got what you asked us for.
string: 你要的东西我们拿到了。

original: You did? That's wonderful news! Please, meet me in my chambers.
string: 是吗？太好了！请到我的房间来。

original: This way.
string: 这边走。

original: So do you truly have it? Please, let me see it.
string: 所以你真的有吗？请让我看看。

original: Of course, Jarl. It's yours.
string: 当然，领主。这是你的。

original: Oh, thank you! It's a miracle you two showed up when you did!
string: 太好了，谢谢！你们二位此时出现真是个奇迹！

original: And what about the thief?
string: 那窃贼呢？

original: Your suspicions were correct. He was one of your guards.
string: 你的怀疑没错，他确实是你手下的卫兵。

original: Oblivion take him!
string: 让他下湮灭去吧！

original: There's something else. Before we killed him, he told us about the content of the letter. That your husband wanted to support Ulfric.
string: 还有件事。杀掉他之前，他向我们透露了那封信的内容。你丈夫曾想支持乌弗瑞克。

original: I'm sorry. I shouldn't have brought it up.
string: 抱歉，我不该提这件事的。

original: No, I... You deserve to know the truth. It's better if you understand how complex the matter was.
string: 不，我……你值得知道真相。明白此事有多复杂，对你更有好处。

original: My Torygg was always loyal to the Empire. He died for it. But the point Ulfric was trying to make gave him pause.
string: 我的托依格始终效忠帝国。他为此献出了生命。但乌弗瑞克提出的观点曾让他陷入深思。

original: He hated the ban on Talos worship as much as any nord, but he also understood why it was necessary to stop the Great War.
string: 他和所有诺德人一样痛恨对塔洛斯信仰的禁令，但他也明白这是终止浩大战争所必需的。

original: The Empire had no choice! The Thalmor could have destroyed us all. Can you understand the difficult position Torygg was in?
string: 帝国别无选择！梭默本可将我们尽数屠戮。你能理解托依格当时身处的困境吗？

original: What he wrote in this scroll was a request to hold a meeting. He was very careful not to get his hopes up, but not to offend him either.
string: 他在这卷轴上写下的，是一份会面的请求。他极为谨慎，既不抱太大希望，也不愿得罪对方。

original: He just wanted to hear him out and come to an agreement before things escalated out of control.
string: 他只是想听听乌弗瑞克的想法，在局势失控前达成共识。

original: He admired him?
string: 他钦佩他吗？

original: Yes. He respected him for standing up for the freedom of religion in spite of the treaty. He saw him as a war hero.
string: 是的。尽管有条约约束，他仍敬重乌弗瑞克为宗教自由挺身而出的勇气，视他为战争英雄。

original: The letter was ready, but Ulfric arrived to request an audience before he could send it to him.
string: 信件已准备妥当，但就在他准备寄出之际，乌弗瑞克已前来求见。

original: That's when we saw that monster for what he truly was. Ulfric never cared about Skyrim! It was all about the throne!
string: 直到那一刻，我们才看清那怪物的真面目。乌弗瑞克根本不在乎天际！他满心想的只有王座！

original: Can you imagine how my Torygg must have felt as his hero--?!
string: 你能想象当我的托依格发现他心目中的英雄——？！

original: I'm sorry...
string: 对不起……

original: It's alright. You don't need to talk about that moment.
string: 没关系。你不必再提起那一刻了。

original: Thank you...
string: 那就多谢了……

original: That is why the contents of this scroll must be kept a secret. Torygg is a martyr who died for the integrity of the Empire.
string: 正因如此，这卷轴的内容必须保密。托依格是为捍卫帝国统一而牺牲的殉道者。

original: If the people who believed in him learn about this, they may end up joining Ulfric's cause!
string: 若是让信任他的人们得知此事，他们说不定会投向乌弗瑞克的阵营！

original: Even if he killed him?
string: 就算他杀了他？

original: Some nords care more about ideals than the man who's supposed to embody them. If their High King doubted the Empire, they will too.
string: 有些诺德人更看重信念本身，而非本应践行信念之人。若连至高王都对帝国心存疑虑，他们亦会动摇。

original: Ulfric would be rewarded for murdering him, and I cannot allow that! Torygg stood up and died for the Empire! That's a fact.
string: 我绝不容许乌弗瑞克因弑君得势！托依格是为捍卫帝国挺身赴死的！这才是真相。

original: And as long as I breathe, I won't let anyone ruin his memory!
string: 只要我尚存一息，就绝不容许任何人玷污他的记忆！

original: Then you should destroy that scroll. It's the only way to make sure this never happens again.
string: 既然如此，你应当销毁这个卷轴。这是确保此事永不再重演的唯一方法。

original: Yes... You're completely right.
string: 对……你说得完全正确。

original: I was thinking about it myself, but my love for him prevented me from letting go of his last letter. I will hesitate no longer.
string: 我自己也在考虑这件事，但对他的爱让我无法放下他最后的信。我再不会犹豫了。

original: Well said. And... I'm sorry for your loss, my Jarl.
string: 说得好，还有……请节哀，我的领主。

original: Loss is a pain I was bound to experience when I fell in love. I just didn't expect it to happen so soon.
string: 失去是坠入爱河时注定要经历的痛苦，只是没想到来得如此之快。

original: But I don't regret it either. His love was just as genuine as mine.
string: 但我也并不后悔。他的爱意与我同样真挚。

original: Nothing made me more happy than knowing that there was someone who loved me more than anything in the world.
string: 没有什么比知道世上有人爱我胜过一切，更能令我欣喜了。

original: I wouldn't know anything about that.
string: 我对此一无所知。

original: Oh, I'm sure you will someday. I pray that you find the same happiness, and may it be a lasting one too!
string: 我相信你总会遇见。我祈愿你也能找到同样的幸福，愿这份幸福永恒长存！

original: Now, I owe you two a reward for your service, don't I? Five hundred gold each should suffice.
string: 现在，我该给你们两个酬劳了，不是吗？每人五百金币应该足够了。

original: Oh, it doesn't have to be that much! Four hundred would be enough.
string: 噢，不必给这么多！四百就够了。

original: Then consider the extra hundred a token of my appreciation for what you did for me today.
string: 那多出来的一百金币，就当是我对二位今日相助的谢礼吧。

original: I mean it. From the bottom of my heart, I thank you both for helping me.
string: 我是真心的。我衷心感谢你们两位的帮助。

original: You're welcome, my Jarl.
string: 不必客气，我的领主。

original: Come on, let's meet Taaire back in the Radiant Raiment.
string: 走吧，我们回锦衣服饰店找塔瑞。

original: We're back. With septims this time.
string: 我们回来了。这次带着塞普汀。

original: Really now? Well, that's unexpected, but not unwelcome.
string: 真的吗？嗯，这倒挺出人意料的，不过我也不嫌弃。

original: You'll have to meet me back in the shop. I don't go on strolls to enjoy other people's company, you see.
string: 你得回店里找我。我出来散步可不是为了跟人作伴。

original: We wanted to resume our purchase.
string: 我们想继续交易。

original: So, I trust you want the same article as before?
string: 想必你还是要之前那件吧？

original: Yes, please. Here's what I owe you.
string: 是的，请收下。这是我应付给你的。

original: These look like genuine septims, alright. The circlet's yours. Please, try it on.
string: 这些确实是真品塞普汀金币。头环归你了，请戴上试试吧。

original: Of course. How do I look?
string: 当然。我看起来怎么样？

original: Oh, you look radiant, my lady. I can tell this circlet was made for you.
string: 啊，您真是光彩照人，夫人。这顶头冠简直为您量身打造的。

original: Me too. It enhances your natural gloom.
string: 我也这么觉得。它能衬托出你与生俱来的忧郁气质。

original: Please, ignore her.
string: 请别理她。

original: Don't worry about it. And thanks for the business, Altmer.
string: 不必在意。多谢惠顾，高精灵。

original: Likewise, my lady. Please, come again soon.
string: 同样，夫人。欢迎再次光临。

original: Well, that covers the souvenir. Only took the whole day.
string: 好了，纪念品搞定了。居然花了一整天。

original: Do you want to continue the tour, or should we call it a day?
string: 你是想继续游览，还是今天就到这儿？

original: I think I've seen enough. It's been a long day, but kind of fun too. Thank you for suggesting this idea!
string: 我觉得看得差不多了。今天真是漫长的一天，不过也挺有意思的。谢谢你提出这个主意！

original: I've certainly learned far more than I bargained for...
string: 我学到的东西可比预想的多多了……

original: You mean about Jarl Elisif?
string: 你是说艾利西弗领主的事？

original: Yeah. When we got her job, I didn't expect we'd get so involved with her personal life.
string: 是啊。我们接下她的活儿时，可没想到会这么深入地牵扯进她的私生活里。

original: But what surprised me is the way she described her relationship with her husband. It sounded like something I'd read in a romance book.
string: 但真正让我惊讶的是她描述自己和丈夫关系的方式，听起来就像是我在爱情小说里读到的情节。

original: No wonder. She was clearly in love with him.
string: 那不奇怪。她显然是爱着他的。

original: I know, I know. I just find it hard to believe that two people can form such a strong connection. Even after one passes away.
string: 我知道，我知道。我只是觉得很难相信，两个人之间能建立起那么深厚的感情，即便其中一方已经过世了。

original: I guess it's not so difficult for everyone...
string: 我猜，对大家来说，这应该没那么难……

original: What do you mean?
string: 你什么意思？

original: Oh! Nothing. We should get going now.
string: 哦！没什么。我们该走了。

original: Sure, let's go.
string: 当然，我们走吧

original: After you. And thanks for the tour.
string: 你先请。还有，谢谢你带我游览。

original: By the way, you actually have good taste. That circlet suits you.
string: 顺便说一句，你的品味还真不错。那个头环很配你。

original: You think so? Thanks! I always thought black and red were my colors!
string: 你这么觉得？谢谢！我一直觉得黑色和红色是属于我的颜色！

original: I never did like jewelry that stands out, but I still have to show off my status as vampire royalty, don't you think?
string: 我从来都不喜欢太招摇的首饰，可我总得显示一下我吸血鬼王室的身份，你说对吧？

original: Come on. Let's get out of here. And thanks for the tour.
string: 走吧，我们离开这儿。还有，谢谢你的导览。

original: So... Is this the place where you met your suitors?
string: 所以……你就是在这儿见那些追求者的？

original: I-I'm sorry, what?
string: 我——抱歉，你说什么？

original: I, um... The, ah... What you told me back in Solitude?
string: 我，嗯……那个……就是之前你在独孤城跟我说的事？

original: What does that have to do with what we're doing right now?
string: 那跟我们现在做的事有什么关系？

original: I just wanted to know the full story.
string: 我只是想知道整个故事。

original: What does that have to do with what we're doing right now?
string: 那跟我们现在做的事有什么关系？

original: Oh. You know, just, ah... Starting some conversation?
string: 嗯……就是，呃……聊聊天？

original: And it has to be about my suitors, specifically?
string: 而且非得是聊我的追求者们？

original: I just find your life interesting. I want to know more.
string: 我只是觉得你的生活很有趣，想多了解一些。

original: And it has to be about my suitors, specifically?
string: 而且非得是聊我的追求者们？

original: Come on, humor me.
string: 哎呀，迁就我一下。

original: Fine... To answer your question, yes. This is probably where our respective parents would set us loose after my mother interviewed his.
string: 好吧……回答你的问题，没错。这大概就是当年我母亲见过对方家长后，双方父母会放我们自由活动的场所。

original: But to tell you the truth, I barely remember what happened then. I was still a human, so imagine how long ago that was.
string: 但说实话，我几乎记不清当时的情形了。那会儿我还是人类呢，想想这得是多少年前的事了。

original: All I can recall is how embarrassed I walked out of those meetings. And not in a good way. I really hated being left alone with complete strangers.
string: 我只记得自己每次从这种见面场景离开时有多尴尬，而且特别难堪。我真的很讨厌被单独丢给素不相识的人。

original: I never had anyone to talk to, except for my family and the castle staff, so I felt anxiety whenever a stranger approached me.
string: 那时候除了家人和城堡里的仆从，我根本没和别人说过话。所以一有陌生人靠近，我就会紧张。

original: And it didn't help to hear them talk about marriage and all that stuff. I didn't know how to defend myself, so I just waited for it to be over.
string: 而且听他们谈论婚姻之类的话题更让我难受。我不知道该怎么反驳，只能默默等着这一切结束。

original: The one thing I can recall clearly is how my mother scolded me after those meetings, telling me how to behave when in the presence of a suitor.
string: 唯一记得清楚的是，每次见面后母亲都会训斥我，教我该如何在追求者面前表现得体。

original: Funnily enough, I learned how to scare them off by doing the exact opposite of what she said. That sort of helped me get over my anxiety. It was fun!
string: 有意思的是，我反而学会了用和她教导完全相反的方式吓跑他们。这倒让我慢慢克服了紧张情绪，还挺好玩的！

original: That's surprisingly detailed for something you barely remember.
string: 这可不像你说得那么记忆模糊，细节明明这么丰富呢。

original: Huh. Yeah, I do remember about it more than I thought.
string: 唔。是啊，好像确实比我自己以为的要记得清楚些。

original: Okay, that's enough about me. What's your love story?
string: 好了，关于我的事说得够多了。你的爱情故事呢？

original: Well... I've never had any luck with girls. Just broken hearts.
string: 这个嘛……我跟女孩子之间向来没什么缘分，尽是些伤心事。

original: Really? That's strange. You seem pretty attractive to me.
string: 不会吧？真叫人意外。我觉得你明明很有魅力啊。

original: Maybe you just had to mature a little before engaging in a relationship. You were younger back then, were you?
string: 也许你只是需要先成熟些再开始恋情。那时候你还年轻吧？

original: Yeah. I was.
string: 是啊，我确实是。

original: Well, I'd say you're fairly mature for what I've seen. You'd have a lady in each arm if you tried.
string: 就我所见，你已经相当成熟了。若是真想的话，一边搂一个女孩子都不成问题。

original: I had a lover once, but it didn't end well.
string: 我有过一个恋人，只可惜结局不太好。

original: Really? What was she like?
string: 真的吗？她是个怎样的人？

original: She was really kind, but we had to go our separate ways.
string: 她非常温柔，只是我们终究各奔东西了。

original: I'm sorry to hear that. You were fond of her, were you?
string: 听到这个真遗憾。你很喜欢她，是吗？

original: Incredibly beautiful, but equally selfish.
string: 美得不可方物，也自私得无以复加。

original: So I was right. You really do fall for a pretty face!
string: 看来我猜对了。你果然会为一张漂亮的脸动心！

original: Sorry, I didn't mean to sound insensitive.
string: 抱歉，我不是故意说得那么没心没肺的。

original: She certainly had energy. In her fists.
string: 她精力倒是很充沛。都用在拳头上了。

original: Oh.
string: 哦。

original: I think I can imagine how your breakup was.
string: 我大概能想象你们是怎么分手的了。

original: A literal nightmare.
string: 简直是场噩梦。

original: Decided to court Vaermina herself, did you? it must have been tough.
string: 怎么，你是去追求瓦尔米纳本尊了吗？那肯定很不好过吧。

original: I meant that I lost her
string: 我的意思是，我失去了她。

original: Oh... I'm so sorry.
string: 哦……真抱歉。

original: I didn't mean to bring up a bad memory.
string: 我不是有意要提起你的伤心往事。

original: It's fine. That was years ago. I'm already over it.
string: 没事，那都是很多年前的事了，我早就放下了。

original: That's good to hear.
string: 很高兴听到这个消息。

original: Don't worry about it. I'm over it.
string: 别担心，我已经放下了。

original: That's good to hear.
string: 很高兴听到这个消息。

original: None. I've been a loner most of my life.
string: 没有。我这辈子大部分时间都是独来独往。

original: I see.
string: 明白了。

original: But, do you want to... You know. Find someone?
string: 但是，你想不想……你也明白的，找一个？

original: Yeah, someday. You?
string: 嗯，总有一天吧。你呢？

original: I try not to think about it.
string: 我尽量不去想这事。

original: But I hope you find someone. I'm sure you'll make a good partner.
string: 但还是希望你能找到另一半。我相信你一定会是个好伴侣。

original: A redguard from Whiterun seduced me to do her dirty work. She was just using me.
string: 白漫城有个红卫女人，她引诱我帮她干脏活，结果只是在利用我。

original: So basically you fell for her pretty face. Figures.
string: 说白了，你就是被她的美貌迷住了。不出所料。

original: Sorry, but it serves you right. Next time, get to know a woman better before kissing the ground she walks on.
string: 说白了，你就是被她的美貌迷住了。不出所料。

original: You know what? This was a good talk. I had fun!
string: 你知道吗？我们聊得很开心，我很高兴！

original: Me too! I never thought I'd be willing to talk about stuff like this with someone.
string: 我也是！真没想到我会愿意跟人聊这些。

original: Anyway, this is all very touching, but don't we have some more important things to worry about right now?
string: 不管怎样，这确实很感人，但我们现在不是有更重要的事情要担心吗？

original: With actual money, if possible.
string: 若方便的话，请带真金白银来。

original: Do you want to dance?
string: 你想跳支舞吗？

original: I... What?
string: 我……哈？

original: Where in Oblivion did that come from?!
string: 这是在搞哪一出？！

original: Well... I'd figure you'd be into that sort of thing, so...
string: 嗯……我还以为你会对那种事情感兴趣的，所以……

original: I think I told you I sneaked away from my family's parties! Why would I--?
string: 我想我告诉过你我从家庭聚会上溜走的事了！我怎么会——？

original: Look, we... We should talk about this another time.
string: 听着，我们……我们得找个时间谈谈这个。

original: Can we talk about what I proposed yestedray? The dance, I mean.
string: 我们能不能谈谈昨天的事？我是说，跳舞的事。

original: So... You were serious about it.
string: 所以……你当时是认真的啊。

original: I just wanted to apologize. I didn't mean to make you uncomfortable.
string: 我只是想道个歉。我不是有意让你感到不自在的。

original: Look, before you say anything... Can we continue this conversation in the courtyard? I'd feel more comfortable there.
string: 听着，在你开口前……我们能不能去庭院里再谈谈？在那里我会感觉更自在些。

original: Shall we talk here?
string: 我们在这里谈可以吗？

original: Yes. Thank you for bringing me here.
string: 可以，谢谢你带我来这儿。

original: I wanted to apologize for overreacting when you proposed to dance with me. I didn't mean to hurt your feelings.
string: 我想为昨天你邀请时的过度反应道歉。我不是有意要伤害你的感情。

original: You want to do this? You feel ready?
string: 你想跳吗？准备好了吗？

original: Yeah. If we take it nice and slow, I think I'll be able to do this.
string: 嗯。如果我们跳得轻缓些，我想我应该能行。

original: But just so you know, I have never danced before... You'll see how green I am soon enough.
string: 不过先说好，我从没跳过舞……你马上就会看到我有多生涩了。

original: Don't feel bad about it. I overstepped my boundaries.
string: 别过意不去。是我越界了。

original: No, you didn't! It shouldn't be such a big deal for me! I just had a lapse when you proposed it.
string: 不，你没有！这对我来说本就不该是什么大事！我只是那时候一下子没反应过来。

original: But to be honest... It made me happy when I began to think about it.
string: 但说实话……后来仔细想想，我其实很开心。

original: Listen. You already know how hard it is for me to get so close to someone. Even you.
string: 听着，你知道我很难与别人这么亲近。即便是你。

original: But if I want to commit to us... I'll have to cross this threshold. It's the same as when you gave me this ring.
string: 可既然决定了要在一起……我就必须跨出这一步。就像当初你为我戴上这枚戒指时那样。

original: Then I guess we're matching colors. We'll learn as we go.
string: 看来我们还挺有默契。慢慢学着配合吧。

original: Alright. Let's not screw this up.
string: 当然。咱们可别搞砸了。

original: Then I'll lead. I know what I'm doing.
string: 那么我来带舞吧。我知道该怎么跳。

original: Alright. I'll trust you with this.
string: 行呐。我相信你的技术。

original: That was... I think I stepped on your foot? Maybe we should have practiced beforehand.
string: 刚才是不是……我踩到你脚了？或许我们真该先练习一下的。

original: Are you feeling alright?
string: 你还好吗？

original: Yeah. It... Despite everything, it felt good.
string: 没事。嗯……虽然跳得磕磕绊绊的，但感觉很好。

original: Thank you for being so patient with me. This was hard for me, but... I enjoyed it.
string: 谢谢你对我这么耐心。跳舞对我来说并不容易，但……我很开心。

original: Maybe... Maybe we can do this some other time. I'll let you know when I'm ready.
string: 或许……或许我们可以改天再跳一次。等我想的时候会告诉你的。

original: Do you have a minute? I think we should take a detour.
string: 有时间吗？我觉得我们应该绕一下路。

original: A detour? Why?
string: 绕路？为什么？

original: I'm guessing we'll head directly to find the bow right after learning of its location, won't we?
string: 我猜，我们一知道那把弓的下落，就会立刻直接去找它，对吧？

original: It's going to be a long journey. Having some extra potions might be good for us in the long run.
string: 这将是一段漫长的旅程。多备些药水对我们来说总没坏处。

original: I can make the basic health and magicka potions, but I don't have materials to craft the others we'll need. We have to buy those.
string: 基础的生命和魔力药水我能做，但做其他我们需要的药水，我没有材料。那些得我们自己去买。

original: Don't worry, I can pay for them this time with what I have left from Elisif's pay. We won't have another job hunting episode.
string: 别担心，这次我可以用艾利西弗付的钱里剩下的来买。我们不用再像上次那样到处找活干了。

original: Are you sure? 100 gold might not be enough.
string: 你确定吗？100金币可能不够。

original: Oh, I've got much more now. I may or may not have looted our enemies after killing them. It's a surprisingly reliable source of income.
string: 哦，我现在可不止那么点了。干掉敌人后我都会顺手摸尸。这法子来钱还挺稳的。

original: I learned that by watching you, of course. I have over a thousand gold now.
string: 当然了，这都是看你的学来的。我现在有一千多金币了。

original: So all that's left is to find a city where to buy these products at a rather fair price. Any ideas?
string: 所以现在就只剩下去找个价钱公道的城市买东西了。有什么想法吗？

original: Whiterun's market has a decent reputation. It's on our way to the glade too.
string: 白漫城的市场名声不错。而且去林地也顺路。

original: Then Whiterun it is.
string: 那就去白漫城吧。

original: Here. I made a list of the potions we'll need. Give it to the apothecary so that we can speed up the process.
string: 给你。我列了个单子，上面是我们需要买的药水。把它交给药剂师，这样能快一些。

original: Can't you ask her yourself?
string: 你不能自己去问她吗？

original: I could.
string: 我能。

original: Or, I could brew the other potions I mentioned earlier while you talk to her and save time.
string: 或者，你去跟她谈的时候，我正好可以把刚才说的其他那些药水配好，这样能省点时间。

original: Come on, let's get to Whiterun.
string: 走吧，我们去白漫城。

original: We'd like to make a purchase. It's in this note.
string: 我们想买些东西，都在这张单子上了。

original: Why, of course. Let's see...
string: 当然，为什么不呢。让我看看……

original: Oh. Well, you two sure spare no expenses. These many potions won't come cheap, you know?
string: 哦。你们两个可真是舍得花钱。这么多药水，价钱可不便宜啊，知道吗？

original: Say, I have a bit of a problem right now, but I can't solve it without leaving the store unattended. Would you like to be a lifesaver for a discount?
string: 听着，我现在有点麻烦，但又不能扔下店不管。你们要是能帮我个忙，我就给你们打个折，怎么样？

original: Sorry, but I don't do business in my free time. Wait until I reopen the store, okay?
string: 不好意思，我现在休息，不做生意。等我重新开店再说，好吗？

original: Go talk to the apothecary. I'll work on the alchemy table.
string: 去找药剂师谈谈，我来用炼金台。

original: Alright. So she is somewhere on the top of the mountain, in the palace's surroundings. Let's hope she hasn't used the potion yet.
string: 好的。她在山顶上，宫殿附近。希望她还没喝下那瓶药水。

original: Any progress with the you-know-what?
string: “那件事”有什么进展吗？

original: Works for me. What do you want?
string: 对我来说没问题。你想要什么？

original: Ah, splendid, splendid!
string: 啊，太好了，太好了！

original: So I don't know if I ever told you this, but I have been working on a love elixir for a while now. Pretty much the whole city knows this.
string: 我不知道有没有跟你说过，我最近一直在研究一种爱情药水。现在这事儿差不多全城都知道了。

original: The thing is that earlier today, Saffir's daughter sneaked in and took a prototype I was working on. She had already left before I could yell at her.
string: 问题是，今天早些时候，萨菲尔的女儿溜了进来，拿走了我正在研究的一个样品。我还没来得及喊她，她就跑了。

original: I'm afraid we can't help you right now.
string: 恐怕我们现在帮不了你。

original: Oh. That's fine. I understand.
string: 哦。好吧。我理解。

original: That'll be 2,300 septims for the whole set of potions you requested.
string: 你们要的这一整套药水，一共是2300塞普汀。

original: I mean... We CAN help you right now.
string: 我的意思是……我们现在可以帮你。

original: See? That's what I thought.
string: 你看？我就知道。

original: So I don't know if I ever told you this, but I have been working on a love elixir for a while now. Pretty much the whole city knows this.
string: 我不知道有没有跟你说过，我最近一直在研究一种爱情药水。现在这事儿差不多全城都知道了。

original: The thing is that earlier today, Saffir's daughter sneaked in and took a prototype I was working on. She had already left before I could yell at her.
string: 问题是，今天早些时候，萨菲尔的女儿溜了进来，拿走了我正在研究的一个样品。我还没来得及喊她，她就跑了。

original: And this is bad because...
string: 这很糟糕，因为……

original: Because that prototype is actually an aphrodisiac. And we don't want a ten-year-old drinking that, don't we?
string: 因为那个样品其实是一种春药。我们总不希望一个十岁的孩子喝下那玩意儿，对吧？

original: I know it's on me for leaving it in plain sight, but I can't close up shop just to chase after a little girl. It would cost me hours of losses.
string: 我知道这怪我，把东西放在那么显眼的地方。但我总不能为了追一个小女孩就把店关了，那得损失好几个小时的生意呢。

original: Then why not just ask the guards for help?
string: 那为什么不直接找卫兵帮忙呢？

original: Because if the guards get involved, her mother will know. And that's when things will get bad for poor Braith.
string: 因为如果卫兵掺和进来，她妈妈就会知道。那样一来，可怜的布赖斯就要倒大霉了。

original: Saffir is... A harsh mother. Last time her daughter got into trouble, she humbled her right in front of everyone. It broke my heart to see her face.
string: 萨菲尔是个……很严厉的母亲。上次她女儿惹了麻烦，她当着所有人的面把孩子狠狠训了一顿。看着那孩子的表情，我心都碎了。

original: I don't want poor Braith to go through that again. She may be a problem child, but I don't think she meant bad when she took the potion.
string: 我不想让可怜的布赖斯再经历一次那种事。她可能是个问题小孩，但我觉得她拿走药水的时候并没有恶意。

original: Please, handle this with discretion. And patience. And quickly, before that potion evokes disaster. It's bad for business too.
string: 拜托，处理这件事一定要谨慎，还要有耐心。动作也得快，免得那瓶药水惹出大乱子。那对我的生意也不好。

original: I guess we're job hunting after all.
string: 看来我们终究还是找起活儿干了。

original: Well, discount hunting, actually.
string: 嗯，其实是找折扣。

original: So what do we know about this Braith girl? Anything that could help us find her?
string: 关于这个叫布赖斯的女孩，我们知道些什么？有什么线索能帮我们找到她吗？

original: No, but we could ask about her around the city.
string: 不清楚，但我们可以在城里四处打听一下。

original: Whatever works. Even if it takes the whole day...
string: 管用就行。就算花上一整天……

original: Have you seen Braith?
string: 你见过布赖斯吗？

original: That annoying brat? No, thank the gods.
string: 那个讨厌的小鬼？没，谢天谢地。

original: I saw her getting in and out of Belethor's store, but I paid her no mind afterwards. Belethor might know of her whereabouts.
string: 我看到她进出了一趟贝莱托尔的店，但之后就没再注意她了。贝莱托尔或许知道她的去向。

original: No, I'm sorry. But why don't you try asking one of the stall owners? They're more observant than you'd think.
string: 没有，不好意思。不过你为什么不去问问那些摊主呢？他们可比你想象的要眼尖多了。

original: Amren's child? I think I saw her over Carlotta's stall earlier today. Maybe she knows more.
string: 阿穆伦的家的孩子？我好像今天早些时候在卡萝塔的摊位那边见过她。或许卡萝塔知道得多一些。

original: Hm... I think I saw her over Carlotta's stall. Why don't you ask her?
string: 嗯……我好像在卡萝塔的摊位那边看到过她。你为什么不去问问卡萝塔呢？

original: She came here asking my daughter to talk to her in private. Soon afterwards, poor Mila came back crying.
string: 她来我这儿，让我女儿跟她私下聊聊。没过多久，可怜的米拉就哭着回来了。

original: Whatever they fought over, Braith must have said some mean things to her. I need to talk to her mother when I have the time.
string: 不管她俩为了什么吵架，布赖斯肯定对米拉说了些难听的话。等我有空了，我得去找她妈妈谈谈。

original: I don't know where she went afterwards, but Mila might know. Just be patient with her when you ask her, please.
string: 我不知道她后来去哪儿了，不过米拉可能知道。你问她的时候，麻烦耐心一点。

original: I think I saw her talking to Brenuin earlier. Maybe he knows where she went.
string: 我好像看到她早些时候跟布瑞纽恩说话来着。也许他知道她去哪儿了。

original: Oh, I've seen her alright. In fact, I know exactly where she is.
string: 哦，我当然见过她。其实，我确切地知道她在哪儿。

original: But if you want me to help you out, you're going to have to do something for me first.
string: 但是，你要是想让我帮忙，就得先替我办件事。

original: The redguard girl? I saw her arguing with Mila earlier. I didn't mean to eavesdrop, but they seemed to be fighting over Lars.
string: 那个红卫人女孩？我早些时候看见她和米拉在吵架。我不是有意偷听，但她们好像是为了拉斯在争风吃醋。

original: Turns out my little brother is finally becoming popular with the ladies! Maybe I ought to talk to him about the heart of a maiden. Man to man!
string: 原来我弟弟终于开始受女孩子欢迎了！也许我该跟他聊聊少女的心思。男人对男人地聊！

original: Saffir's little scamp? She came here to buy a piece of paper and some ink to write a letter earlier today.
string: 萨菲尔家那个小淘气？她今天早些时候来我这儿买了张纸和一些墨水，说是要写信。

original: I don't know where she went afterwards, but she mumbled something about Carlotta's daughter while she was writing. Maybe she knows more.
string: 我不知道她后来去哪儿了，但她写信的时候，嘴里嘟囔着什么卡萝塔的女儿。也许她知道得多一些。

original: I was told you've met with Braith earlier. Do you know where she went?
string: 听说你之前见过布赖斯。你知道她去哪儿了吗？

original: I don't care about that idiot! She can trip and hurt her ugly nose for all I care!
string: 我才不管那个白痴呢！她就算摔一跤，磕破她那丑鼻子，我也不在乎！

original: Calm down! What happened between you two?
string: 冷静一些！你们俩之间发生什么事了？

original: She asked me to deliver a letter to Lars. I knew she was up to no good, so I said no. That Lars deserved better.
string: 她让我给拉斯送一封信。我知道她准没安好心，所以就拒绝了。拉斯值得更好的人。

original: Then she got upset and told me to never speak to him ever again. That's dumb! She doesn't get to tell me who I want to play with!
string: 然后她就生气了，让我以后再也别跟拉斯说话。这太蠢了！她凭什么管我跟谁玩！

original: Then she... She said that my father hated me so much that he preferred to die rather than have me as his daughter. I cried and... She just left.
string: 然后她……她说我爸爸特别讨厌我，宁可去死，也不想有我这么个女儿。我就哭了，然后……她就走了。

original: We'll tell her to apologize. Do you know where she is now?
string: 我们会让她道歉的。你知道她现在在哪儿吗？

original: I think I saw her going to the Cloud District, but I don't think she's inside Dragonsreach. She got into trouble last time we went there.
string: 我好像看到她往云顶区去了，但我不觉得她会进龙临宫。我们上次去那儿的时候，她惹了麻烦。

original: Maybe she's waiting outside. Please, hurry there before she drags Lars into her own problems again! She's always bullying him!
string: 也许她在外面等着呢。拜托，快去吧，别让她再把拉斯拖进她自己的麻烦里了！她总是欺负他！

original: Though she sometimes praises him when he's not around for some reason. She's so weird!
string: 虽然有时候拉斯不在场，她又会莫名其妙地夸他。她这人真怪！

original: Are you serious?! I'm fed up with running errands!
string: 不是吧？！我受够了给人跑腿了！

original: Errands? I'm a beggar, for Mara's sake! I just want gold!
string: 跑腿？看在玛拉的份上，我就是个乞丐！我只要钱！

original: And I don't want the usual charity tip. I barely get by with those! 30 septims and I'll gladly tell you where she went.
string: 而且我不要平时那种施舍的小钱。那点钱我根本活不下去！给我30个金币，我就高高兴兴地告诉你她去哪儿了。

original: I think I'll ask someone else.
string: 我看我还是问别人吧。

original: Well, may the divines spit on you while you're at it, you pompous miser!
string: 好吧，愿诸神在你身上吐口水，你这个自大的吝啬鬼！

original: That's right! I know what "miser" means. You think I don't read?
string: 没错！我知道“吝啬鬼”是什么意思。你以为我不读书吗？

original: Seems fair. Here you go. (30 gold)
string: 听起来还算公道。给你。（30金币）

original: Wait, I can actually charge people in exchange for intel?
string: 等等，原来我可以用情报换钱吗？

original: This is awesome! I should have done this ages ago!
string: 这真是太棒了！我早该这么干了！

original: So to answer your question, Braith came to me with a letter. Said it's for Lars Battle-Born. She told me not to read it, but I couldn't help myself.
string: 所以呢，回答你的问题吧。布赖斯拿着一封信来找我，说是给拉斯·战狂的。她让我别看，但我实在没忍住。

original: The letter says "Meet me in the Cloud District. If you don't come, I'll pull you by the hair and drag you there myself". Kids these days...
string: 信上说：“在云顶区见我。你要是不来，我就拽着你的头发把你拖过去。”现在的孩子啊……

original: I was about to deliver the letter to Lars in a few minutes. You should be able to talk to her before I send him on his way.
string: 我过几分钟正准备去给拉斯送信呢。你应该赶得及在我让他动身之前跟她谈谈。

original: Note that the letter mentions the Cloud District, not Dragonsreach, so she's not waiting inside the palace. Try looking outside.
string: 注意，信里提的是云顶区，不是龙临宫，所以她不会在宫殿里等。试试在外面找找。

original: Pleasure doing business with you!
string: 合作愉快！

original: So... Braith?
string: 所以……布赖斯？

original: Oh, right!
string: 哦，对！

original: I saw her talking to Brenuin later, then she headed upstairs all the way to Dragonsreach. Hasn't come down since.
string: 后来我看到她跟布瑞纽恩说了会儿话，然后就一直往上走，去了龙临宫。从那之后就没下来过。

original: So she's in Dragonsreach now?
string: 所以她现在在龙临宫里？

original: Not inside Dragonsreach. She punched the Jarl's daughter a few weeks ago, so she got banned from entering the palace.
string: 不是在龙临宫里面。几周前她打了领主的女儿，所以被禁止进入宫殿了。

original: But she's definitely somewhere in the Cloud District. Try searching outside the building before she gets into trouble again.
string: 但她肯定就在云顶区的某个地方。在她又惹麻烦之前，去宫殿外面找找吧。

original: Go away! Or I'll tell the guards you stole from me!
string: 滚开！不然我就告诉守卫你偷我东西了！

original: Oh, that's rich. How about we also tell them about the potion you stole?
string: 哦，这可真有意思。那我们顺便也告诉他们你偷药水的事怎么样？

original: Wha-- Th-that's dumb! You can't prove it!
string: 什么——这……这太扯了！你又没证据！

original: Arcadia can. She caught you stealing it.
string: 阿尔凯迪雅有。她亲眼看到你偷了。

original: So? It's been sitting there for days! She was never gonna use it anyways!
string: 那又怎么样？那药水在那儿放了好几天了！反正她也根本不会用！

original: That's no excuse. Give it to us, or we'll call your parents.
string: 这不是借口。把它交出来，不然我们就叫你爸妈来。

original: No! Please, no! I need it! I really do! You can't tell anyone!
string: 不！求你们了，别！我需要它！我真的需要！你们不能告诉任何人！

original: Please, don't tell my mother! She never listens, and papa never helps!
string: 求求你们，别告诉我妈！她从来不听我说话，爸爸也从来不帮我！

original: Hey, let me talk to her, okay?
string: 嘿，让我跟她谈谈，好吗？

original: Are you sure? We're going nowhere with this.
string: 你确定？我们这样下去也谈不出什么结果。

original: Just let me handle this. I... I believe I can get through to her.
string: 交给我吧。我……我相信我能让她开口。

original: Hey. I'm sorry. We didn't mean to make you upset. Do you mind telling us why you need the potion?
string: 嘿，对不起。我们不是故意惹你生气的。能告诉我们你为什么需要这瓶药水吗？

original: That's none of your business! Besides, you'll just tell everyone! I'm surrounded by snitches!
string: 这不关你们的事！再说，你们肯定会到处乱说！我身边全是告密的小人！

original: Okay, then... How about I tell you a secret in return? If I snitch, you snitch. Do we have a deal?
string: 好吧，那这样……我跟你交换一个秘密怎么样？如果我告密，你也告密。成交吗？

original: Whatever!
string: 管他呢！

original: So what's your secret, anyway?
string: 所以，你的秘密到底是什么？

original: My parents betrayed me once. When I was younger, they became friends with a horrible person.
string: 我爸妈曾经背叛过我。我小时候，他们跟一个很坏的人交了朋友。

original: He promised to give them everything they ever wanted, but in return, they had to give him that which they treasured most.
string: 他承诺给他们想要的一切，但作为回报，他们必须把自己最珍视的东西交给他。

original: What was it?
string: 那是什么？

original: Me. They left me alone with that monster. And they kept me in the dark until I couldn't run away.
string: 我。他们把我一个人丢给了那个怪物。而且他们一直瞒着我，直到我再也无法逃跑。

original: It was only a while, but I got really scared. I wanted my parents to protect me from him, but they abandoned me.
string: 虽然时间不长，但我真的吓坏了。我本希望爸妈能保护我，但他俩却抛弃了我。

original: They all hurt me. And it still hurts. I know what it feels like when your parents fail you.
string: 他们都伤害了我。直到现在，我心里还是很痛。我知道被父母辜负是什么滋味。

original: That's why I'm telling you that when they're not there for you, you have to rely on your friends.
string: 所以，我才想告诉你，当他们不在你身边时，你得依靠朋友。

original: Look. You don't have to tell us why you took the potion, but you have to share this with someone you trust, okay? You'll feel much better then.
string: 听着，你不用告诉我们你为什么拿那瓶药水，但你必须把这件事告诉一个你信得过的人，好吗？那样你会感觉好很多。

original: I know that better than anybody.
string: 我比任何人都清楚这件事。

original: I... I hurt Mila earlier. I can't tell anyone anymore.
string: 我……我之前伤害了米拉。我再也不能跟任何人说了。

original: But you told me your secret, so I guess I should tell you mine. My parents suck too, by the way. I'm sorry they left you with that bastard.
string: 但你把你的秘密告诉了我，所以我想我也该把我的告诉你。顺便说一句，我爸妈也糟透了。很遗憾他们把你丢给那个混蛋。

original: Thanks, Braith.
string: 谢谢，布赖斯。

original: The love potion is for Lars. Well, for both of us. If we drink it together, he'll kiss me, won't he?
string: 这瓶爱情药水是给拉斯的。嗯，应该说是给我们俩的。如果我们一起喝下去，他就会吻我了，对吧？

original: Why would you want him to kiss you? I heard you tend to bully him.
string: 你为什么要他亲你？我听说你老是欺负他。

original: I know! I tried everything already! Insults, beat-ups... Mother only has to yell at papa! What could I be doing wrong?
string: 我知道！我什么招都试过了！骂他、打他……可我妈只要对我爸吼一声就行了！我到底哪儿做错了？

original: I think your parents have the wrong idea. If you like someone--
string: 我觉得你爸妈的想法是错的。如果你喜欢一个人——

original: I-I never said I liked him!
string: 我……我可没说我喜欢他！

original: Right, sorry. But if you want him to kiss you, you have to act more friendly towards him.
string: 对，抱歉。但如果你想让他亲你，就得对他友好一点。

original: Listen to him. Be honest with him. And most importantly, be patient. Kisses come to those who wait.
string: 倾听他的心声，对他坦诚相待。最重要的是，要有耐心。吻总会留给愿意等待的人。

original: And how do you know that?
string: 你怎么知道？

original: I read my fair share of romance books. Seemed to work there.
string: 我看了不少言情小说，书里都是这么写的。

original: Might as well work with him.
string: 在他身上应该也管用。

original: Um... Hi?
string: 呃……喂？

original: What do I say to him?
string: 那我该跟他说什么呢？

original: Just be honest. You'll do great!
string: 实话实说就行。你肯定没问题的！

original: Look, um... If this is about the money, I still don't have anything. My parents won't give me an allowance!
string: 听着，那个……如果是因为钱的事，我现在还是没有。我爸妈不给我零花钱了！

original: Just give me some more time! I'll give you fifteen septims next time! I swear!
string: 再多给我点时间！我下次给你十五个塞普汀！我发誓！

original: Forget it.
string: 算了吧。

original: Wait, what?
string: 等等，什么？

original: I said forget it! I don't want your stupid money!
string: 我说算了！我不要你那点破钱！

original: You mean it? What a relief!
string: 真的吗？太好了！

original: But only if you take me for a walk tomorrow night! If you do that, I'll forget about your money!
string: 但你明天晚上得带我出去散步才行！你要是答应，我就不要你的钱了！

original: Oh, gods! You want us to sneak inside Dagny's quarters to pay her back for the fight you had, do you?!
string: 哦，天哪！你想让我们溜进达格尼的房间，报复你们俩吵架那事，对吧？！

original: Of course not! I don't care about that smug milk-drinker!
string: 当然不是！我才不在乎那个自以为是的胆小鬼！

original: Besides, I only punched her because she was bad-mouthing you! Only I get to bad-mouth you, got it?!
string: 而且，我打她是因为她在说你坏话！只有我能说你坏话，明白了吗？！

original: Alright, I got it!
string: 好了，我知道了！

original: So... Tomorrow night?
string: 那……明天晚上？

original: Yeah! And you better bring some nice flowers too!
string: 嗯！你最好也带上些好看的花！

original: W-what flowers?
string: 什-什么花？

original: Whichever reminds you of me, dummy! Now go!
string: 笨蛋，当然是能让你看到就能想起我的花啊！快走吧！

original: Okay, okay!
string: 好吧，好吧！

original: I wonder if they have flytraps somewhere...
string: 不知他们是否在某个地方种了捕蝇草……

original: So... How was it?
string: 所以……怎么样？

original: Tone down the yelling next time, but overall, that was a good start.
string: 下次小点声喊，不过总的来说，开头还不错。

original: I guess I won't need the potion anymore. Here.
string: 我想我不再需要这瓶药水了。给你。

original: Thanks, Braith. But I think you also need to apologize to your friend.
string: 谢谢你，布赖斯。不过我觉得你也该跟你朋友道个歉。

original: I know, I know.
string: 我懂，我懂。

original: Don't worry. We'll talk to Arcadia and make sure your parents never hear of this. She won't hold it against you.
string: 别担心。我们会去找阿尔凯迪雅谈谈，保证你爸妈不会知道这事。她不会怪你的。

original: Yeah, um... So what was your name, anyway?
string: 嗯……那个，你叫什么名字来着？

original: Serana.
string: 瑟拉娜。

original: Well, I've got my eye on you, Serana.
string: 嗯，我盯着你呢，瑟拉娜。

original: I like her! She's like a tiny Isran!
string: 我喜欢她！她简直就像个小号的伊士冉！

original: You know what? I like her.
string: 你知道吗？我挺喜欢她的。

original: I must say I'm impressed with how you handled it.
string: 不得不说，你处理这件事的方式让我刮目相看。

original: Yeah. I guess I felt some sort of a kinship with her when I realized her parents were similar to mine. They're not as bad, thankfully, but still...
string: 是啊。当我意识到她的父母和我父母很像的时候，我猜我对她有种惺惺相惜的感觉吧。还好他们没那么糟糕，但还是……

original: I never got to say I'm sorry for what you went through.
string: 我一直没机会对你的遭遇说声抱歉。

original: You don't have to be. That was ages ago, anyway. The less we talk about it, the better.
string: 你不用道歉。反正那都是陈年旧事了，越少提起越好。

original: I'm glad I was able to word it in a way that she wouldn't understand what truly happened during the ritual but... It was hard for me to talk about it
string: 我很高兴我能换种方式说，让她不至于明白仪式中到底发生了什么，但是……要我亲口说出这些，真的很难。

original: I could tell. You were very brave.
string: 我看得出来。你非常勇敢。

original: Let's just return the potion to Arcadia. I'm okay. Really.
string: 我们还是先把药水还给阿尔凯迪雅吧。我没事，真的。

original: We have the love potion.
string: 我们拿到爱情药水了。

original: Ah, splendid, splendid! And the bottle's intact too! I'm glad you managed to retrieve it before she got a chance to use it.
string: 啊，太好了，太好了！瓶子也完好无损！真高兴你们在她有机会用掉之前把药水拿了回来。

original: I wouldn't want to hear the end of that.
string: 我可不想听到那没完没了的抱怨。

original: Shhh! You want to get me into trouble?!
string: 嘘！你想害我惹上麻烦吗？！

original: Now I owe you some potions half their usual price, don't I? Let's leave it at, say, a thousand septims for the whole set?
string: 现在我欠你一些药水，得按半价给你了，对吧？这一整套，咱们就算……一千塞普汀，怎么样？

original: No complaints here. Thanks!
string: 没问题。多谢！

original: Don't mention it, dear.
string: 别客气，亲爱的。

original: Oh! Look who we have here.
string: 哦！瞧瞧是谁来了我们这儿。

original: Sorry I took that potion.
string: 对不起，我拿了那瓶药水。

original: It's okay, dear. But next time, consult an apothecary before drinking any potion, alright? They could have dangerous side-effects!
string: 没事，亲爱的。不过下次喝任何药水前，记得先咨询药剂师，好吗？那些药水可能会有危险的副作用！

original: And don't steal! Ever!
string: 而且不许偷东西！永远不许！

original: Well, next time, don't leave your stupid junk just laying around!
string: 下次别把你那些破烂玩意儿到处乱放！

original: Fair enough.
string: 有道理。

original: Did you apologize to your friend too?
string: 那你跟你朋友道歉了吗？

original: Yeah. She forgave me.
string: 嗯，她原谅我了。

original: Good girl.
string: 好女孩。

original: I also wanted to bring you something, Serana. You said you read romance books, so I brought you one.
string: 瑟拉娜，我也想带给你一样东西。你说你喜欢看爱情小说，所以我给你带来了一本。

original: Wait. Where did you get it?
string: 等等，你从哪儿弄来的？

original: It's my mother's. She never reads a book twice, so she's not going to miss it anyways.
string: 这是我妈妈的。她一本书从来不看第二遍，所以反正她也不会发现少了这本书。

original: Alright, let's see what you have.
string: 好吧，让我看看你有什么。

original: "The Lusty Argonian--"
string: “元气满满的阿尔贡——”

original: Oh, dear.
string: 哦。天哪。

original: Yeah, I don't know what "lusty" means either, but I thought you'd like it. It's about a prince and an argonian baking bread or something.
string: 是啊，我也不知道“元气满满”是什么意思，但我想你应该会喜欢。讲的是一个王子和一个阿尔贡做面包之类的故事。

original: Anyway, I gotta leave! Take care!
string: 总之，我得走了！保重！

original: That girl is too pure for our world.
string: 对我们这个世界来说，那女孩真是太纯洁了。

original: So that's it for our little detour. I didn't expect it to take so long, but I'm glad it did.
string: 好了，我们这个小插曲就到此为止了。我没想到会花这么长时间，不过我很高兴事情解决了。

original: Looks like you even made a friend.
string: 看来你还交了个朋友。

original: Yeah! I guess I got too invested in her antics.
string: 是啊！我猜我太投入，跟着她一起胡闹了。

original: But moreover, I knew where that kind of loneliness was leading her towards. I just wanted to save her from that.
string: 但更重要的是，我知道那种孤独会将她引向何方。我只是想把她从那条路上救出来。

original: I think its admirable of you to spare others from what you went through.
string: 我觉得你能让他人免于遭受你曾经历过的痛苦，这很了不起。

original: Well, it's not like she was starting to worship a Daedra, but it was the least I could do for her.
string: 倒也不是说她开始信奉迪德拉了，但这是我唯一能为她做的了。

original: At first I thought I was doing this out of responsibility, but honestly? It just felt good helping her! Same with Elisif.
string: 起初我以为我这么做是出于责任，但说实话，能帮到她感觉真好！帮艾利西弗的时候也是一样。

original: I don't think I would have gotten so close with them if anyone else had woken me up. Thank you for sticking by and helping me with them.
string: 要不是你唤醒了我，我想我跟她们的关系也不会这么亲近。谢谢你一直陪着我，帮我处理这些事。

original: Don't mention it. It was my pleasure.
string: 别客气，这是我的荣幸。

original: Too bad. I'm still thanking you.
string: 那可不行，我还是要谢谢你。

original: Anyway, we've got all the potions we need. I'll hold onto them, but don't hesitate to ask if you need them. Let's get to the Ancestor Glade.
string: 不管怎样，我们需要的药水都齐了。我先拿着，不过你要是用得着就尽管开口。我们去先祖林地吧。

original: Honestly, I just enjoy spending time with you.
string: 说实话，我只是很享受和你在一起的时光。

original: Me too.
string: 我也是。

original: Anyway, we've got all the potions we need. I'll hold onto them, but don't hesitate to ask if you need them. Let's get to the Ancestor Glade.
string: 不管怎样，我们需要的药水都齐了。我先拿着，不过你要是用得着就尽管开口。我们去先祖林地吧。

original: Let me pay half of the price of those potions. It's only fair. (500 gold)
string: 那些药水钱让我付一半吧，这才公平。（500金币）

original: Are you sure about this?
string: 你确定吗？

original: Well, I guess it is fair. Thank you!
string: 嗯，这么说也算公平。谢谢你！

original: Anyway, we've got all the potions we need. I'll hold onto them, but don't hesitate to ask if you need them. Let's get to the Ancestor Glade.
string: 不管怎样，我们需要的药水都齐了。我先拿着，不过你要是用得着就尽管开口。我们去先祖林地吧。

original: Serana. I need to talk to you. About us.
string: 瑟拉娜。我想和你谈谈，关于我们的事。

original: I think we talked about it enough. Come on now.
string: 我觉得我们已经谈得够多了。先这样吧。

original: Oh, I... I see.
string: 哦，我……我明白了。

original: What is it?
string: 这是什么？

original: Can we talk, Serana? This is important.
string: 能谈谈吗，瑟拉娜？这很重要。

original: Maybe this isn't the best time...
string: 也许现在不是个好时候……

original: Yeah. I don't think it's a good idea to bring this up again.
string: 是啊。我也觉得再提这事不太好。

original: This isn't about marriage. I had more to say.
string: 不是关于结婚的事。我还有些话想说。

original: Just drop the subject, okay? I think it's better for us both if you don't say anything.
string: 别再提这个了，好吗？你保持沉默对我们彼此都更好。

original: Please, just... Just hear me out!
string: 求你，就……就听我说完吧！

original: Alright. I'll hear you out. I owe you that much.
string: 好吧。我会听你说完的。这算我欠你的。

original: But this is not going to go the way you think.
string: 但事情不会按你期待的方向发展的。

original: No. I'm sorry, but this is too important for me.
string: 不。我很抱歉，但这件事对我而来说太重要了。

original: Alright. I'll hear you out. I owe you that much.
string: 好吧。我会听你说完的。这算我欠你的。

original: But this is not going to go the way you think.
string: 但事情不会按你期待的方向发展的。

original: I think I'll regret it if I don't.
string: 如果现在不说，我想我一定会后悔的。

original: Alright. I'll hear you out. I owe you that much.
string: 好吧。我会听你说完的。这算我欠你的。

original: But this is not going to go the way you think.
string: 但事情不会按你期待的方向发展的。

original: I don't care. I'm seeing this through to the end.
string: 我不在乎。我会坚持到底。

original: Very well then. Say what you need to say.
string: 那好吧。把你想说的都说出来吧。

original: You're special to me. More than anyone I've ever met.
string: 你对我很特别。比我遇见过的任何人都更特别。

original: Yeah. I noticed that much. And you're very important to me too.
string: 嗯。这点我能感受到。而你对我也同样非常重要。

original: But I think it's best if we just leave it at that. Nothing good will come out of taking a step further with this.
string: 但我认为我们最好就此打住。再进一步是不会有好结果的。

original: I think there's more between us than just friendship.
string: 我觉得我们之间不该只是友谊。

original: Being vague won't make things easier for either of us. But I get the message.
string: 含糊其辞对我们谁都没有好处。但我明白你的意思了。

original: Listen, I know this is important for you, but I think it's better if our relationship doesn't go beyond just friendship. It won't end well.
string: 听着，我知道这对你很重要，但我觉得我们的关系最好还是停留在友谊层面。再进一步是不会有好结果的。

original: I've fallen in love with you.
string: 我爱上你了。

original: I... I didn't expect you to be so serious about this.
string: 我……我没想到你会这么认真。

original: This is just gonna make things harder. For both of us.
string: 这只会让事情变得更难办。对我们双方都是。

original: Why? We don't have to marry if you don't want to.
string: 为什么？如果你不愿意，我们不必结婚。

original: This isn't just about marriage. It's... Well... To allow myself to live that kind of life.
string: 这不只是婚姻的问题。而是……要我允许自己去过那样的生活。

original: I don't think you can fathom what me and my family did to gain eternal life. I became an accomplice of that out of my own volition.
string: 你根本无法想象我和我的家族为了获得永生都做过什么。而我曾是自愿参与那些行径的帮凶。

original: I promised myself I wouldn't contemplate the possibility of living the life I took from the people me and my family sacrificed in Molag Bal's honor.
string: 我发过誓，我绝不会去奢望过上那种生活。那种被我和家族献祭给莫拉格·巴尔的人们——他们原本该有的人生。

original: Then I met you and... It became the first time I've ever been so close to someone besides my mother.
string: 后来我遇见了你……这是我第一次与母亲之外的人如此亲近。

original: I'm happy whenever I'm with you, and all the echoes of my past just quiet down. Thanks to you I'm doing things I'd never dare to do before.
string: 和你在一起的每一刻都让我感到快乐，所有往事的回响都沉寂下来。多亏了你，我现在敢做许多过去绝不敢尝试的事。

original: Moreover, I know that for as long as we're together, I won't fall for the same trap my father fell into. You make this a lot easier.
string: 更重要的是，我知道只要我们还在一起，我就不会重蹈父亲的覆辙。你让我轻松了许多。

original: But then I realized that I'm breaking my own promise. Accepting that there may be something else between us feels like I'm spitting on their graves.
string: 可后来，我意识到自己正在违背立下的誓言——承认我们之间也许存在着什么，这感觉就像我在践踏那些逝者的坟墓。

original: You mean you do feel something?
string: 你的意思是……你确实对我有感觉？

original: I don't know. I try not to think about it. And maybe it's best if I don't figure it out. I think you're better off forgetting about this as well.
string: 我不知道。我尽量不去想这件事。或许永远想不明白才是最好的。我觉得你也最好把这一切都忘掉。

original: But you're hurting, Serana! I want to help you.
string: 可你在痛苦啊，瑟拉娜！我想帮你。

original: This is something I have to deal with on my own. And I won't let you waste your life chasing after someone who's unworthy of that kind of happiness.
string: 这是我必须独自面对的事。我也不能让你把生命浪费在追逐一个不配拥有那种幸福的人身上。

original: And even if I were to say "yes", what if I can't follow through with it? What will that do to our friendship? I don't want to destroy this!
string: 即便我说“好啊”，而结果却还是做不到呢？我们间的友谊又会怎样呢？我不想毁掉现在的一切！

original: You shouldn't be so hard on yourself. You've suffered enough.
string: 你何必要对自己那么严苛。你承受的已经够多了。

original: That's not up to you to decide. The only people who can are dead... Or worse. How could I face them if I decided to put all that behind me?
string: 这不是由你决定的。所有能决定的人都死了……或者生不如死。如果我决定把这一切都抛在脑后，又该怎么面对他们？

original: And even if I were to say "yes", what if I can't follow through with it? What will that do to our friendship? I don't want to destroy this!
string: 即便我说“好啊”，而结果却还是做不到呢？我们间的友谊又会怎样呢？我不想毁掉现在的一切！

original: But you've done many good things too. You can't let your past define you!
string: 但你也做过很多善事啊。你不能让过去界定你的人生！

original: You weren't there. You have no idea what we did. Most of my earliest memories feel blurred and incomplete. But that? I remember everything vividly.
string: 你当时不在场。你根本不知道我们做了什么。最早的记忆大多都模糊残缺，可唯独那些场景，每个细节我都历历在目。

original: And even if I were to say "yes", what if I can't follow through with it? What will that do to our friendship? I don't want to destroy this!
string: 即便我说“好啊”，而结果却还是做不到呢？我们间的友谊又会怎样呢？我不想毁掉现在的一切！

original: You made it this far by taking risks, Serana. That's your real strength.
string: 你一路走来都在冒险，瑟拉娜。这才是你真正的力量。

original: This is very important for you, is it?
string: 这对你来说非常重要，是吗？

original: Look, I'll... I'll think about it. But I can't promise I'll change my mind.
string: 听着，我会……我会考虑看看。但我不能保证会改变主意。

original: Just... leave me alone for now.
string: 只是……现在先让我一个人静一静吧。

original: Do you accept custom orders?
string: 我能要求定制么？

original: Why, of course, dear. What is it for?
string: 哦，当然，亲爱的。什么用途的呢？

original: It's for a woman to whom I want to express my feelings in a meaningful way.
string: 赠送给一位女士，我想向她郑重表明我的心意。

original: Ohhh, I understand what you're asking. It warms my heart to see love blossom in the younger generations.
string: 噢，我明白您的意思了。看到年轻一代绽放爱意，真是让人心生暖意。

original: If I may, I believe the best way to convey your feelings is with a ring. Necklaces and circlets are just for show, if you ask me.
string: 容我多言一句，我认为传达情意最好的方式莫过于戒指了。要我说，项链与头环终究只是浮于表面的装饰。

original: Then I want an ebony ring decorated with a ruby.
string: 那么我想要一枚镶嵌着红宝石的黑檀木戒指。

original: Ebony? That's quite an expensive material, and for a ring, no less! Do you realize how much this will cost you?
string: 黑檀木？这可是相当昂贵的材质，更何况是制作戒指！您清楚这需要多少花费吗？

original: Her favorite colors are red and black. I need to get this right.
string: 红色和黑色正是她最爱的颜色。我必须把这份心意完美地送达。

original: I can see it's important for you. I won't talk you out of this.
string: 看得出这对您很重要，请原谅我先前的冒失。

original: Let's see... Considering the usual price for our jewelry, the cost of the items, plus shipping expenses... It will cost 900 septims.
string: 我想想……按首饰的正常价格，加上材料费和运费……总共需要900赛普汀。

original: I'm sorry it's so much, but making jewelry requires us to buy the items ourselves. Half of it goes to our suppliers.
string: 很抱歉价格这么高，但制作首饰需要我们自己采购材料，其中一半成本都付给了供应商。

original: I can't afford it right now.
string: 我现在付不起。

original: Don't worry about it. dear. Come back to me when you have enough gold.
string: 不必担心，亲爱的。等您准备好再来找我便是。

original: In the meantime, we'll contact our suppliers and see if they have the materials ready for shipping. We'll be ready when you return.
string: 在此期间，我们会联系供应商确认原料是否备齐。在您回来前，我们会准备好一切的。

original: Don't worry about it. Here you go. (900 gold)
string: 没关系，你要的都在这了。（900 金币）

original: Thanks, dear. It will take us a day to have your order ready. Come back tomorrow.
string: 谢谢，亲爱的。您的订单需要一天内就能完成了，请明日再来取货。

original: And don't worry. Eorlund is a magnificent craftsman. He'll make the ideal ring for your loved one. Skyforge quality.
string: 另外请放心，厄伦德是位杰出的工匠，他定会为您的挚爱打造出一枚完美的戒指——来自天空锻炉的品质。

original: Do you have my order completed?
string: 我的订单完成了吗？

original: Of course, dear. Eorlund finalized the last details this very morning.
string: 当然完成了，亲爱的。厄伦德今早刚完成了最后的润色。

original: I daresay he outdid himself this time. What do you think?
string: 要我说他这次可谓超常发挥。您觉得如何？

original: It's perfect! Thank you.
string: 太完美了！谢谢。

original: I'm so happy it met your expectations.
string: 我很高兴它达到了您的期望。

original: I hope your loved one accepts your feelings. If it helps, I prayed to Mara for you two last night. This ring is truly special.
string: 希望您的心上人能接受您的心意。若您不介意，我昨晚特意向玛拉女神为你们祈愿了。这枚戒指的确与众不同。

original: If you want a piece of advice, don't just give it to her as soon as you see her.
string: 如果您还需要一些建议，请不要一见面就匆忙送出戒指。

original: Find the right place to propose. Somewhere that means something to her. Prove that you paid attention and that you care about her feelings.
string: 找个合适的求婚地点。一个对她有特殊意义的地方。证明你一直在关切她，在乎她的感受。

original: I bought something for you. I want you to have it.
string: 我给你买了点东西，希望你能收下。

original: What? You mean that ring?
string: 什么？你说那枚戒指吗？

original: Look, it's... It's nice, but showering me with gifts won't help me figure things out faster.
string: 听着…戒指很漂亮，但用一件小礼品我不会让我更快理清头绪。

original: That's not it. I just wanted to make you happy.
string: 不是这样的。我只是想让你开心。

original: I know you mean well, but this makes me feel more conflicted than happy.
string: 我知道你是好意，但这让我更矛盾而不是开心。

original: But maybe... Maybe I have been thinking about this for long enough. It's time to talk.
string: 但也许……也许我已经考虑得够久了。是时候谈谈了。

original: I know. And I don't care. I just want you to have this.
string: 我知道。但我不在乎。我只是想把它送给你。

original: We both know it's not that simple. This will make things more complicated for me.
string: 我们都清楚事情没那么简单。这只会让我更纠结。

original: But maybe... Maybe I have been thinking about this for long enough. It's time to talk.
string: 但也许……也许我已经考虑得够久了。是时候谈谈了。

original: I'm not trying to speed things up, Serana, nor I want anything in return.
string: 我并不是想加快进度，瑟拉娜，我也不图任何回报。

original: I know. And I appreciate it, but you're not making this easier for me.
string: 我知道，也很感激，但这着实让我更难抉择了。

original: But maybe... Maybe I have been thinking about this for long enough. It's time to talk.
string: 但也许……也许我已经考虑得够久了。是时候谈谈了。

original: Of course. I'm listening.
string: 当然，我在听。

original: Thank you. Here goes...
string: 谢谢你，那我直说了……

original: I do feel something for you. I don't want to make assumptions of what it is yet, but...
string: 我对你确实怀有某种情感。虽然我还不愿轻易地对它下定义，但……

original: It scares me all the same. I know you would never hurt me, but I still start shivering whenever I get too physically close to someone. Even you.
string: 这仍然会让我感到惶恐。我知道你绝不会伤害我，可每当与人肢体靠近时，我依然会不自觉地战栗——即便那个人是你。

original: Because of the...?
string: 是因为……？

original: Yes, let's... Let's not get into that.
string: 嗯，我们……还是别谈那个了。

original: But it's not just that. This is the first time I'm facing so much uncertainty.
string: 但不仅如此。这是我第一次面对如此多的不确定。

original: I don't think I've ever had something so beautiful within my grasp. I'm happy when we're together, but I don't want this to change.
string: 我从未想过如此美好的事物会触手可及。和你共处的时光很幸福，可我却不愿改变现状。

original: So what happens if I take that ring? What if I end up ruining this? What if I regret taking that step? What will become of our friendship?
string: 要是我戴上那枚戒指会发生什么呢？要是我最终搞砸了一切呢？要是我后悔迈出了这一步呢？我们的友谊又将何去何从？
