original: You think it's not worth the risk?
string: 你认为这会是场不值得的冒险吗？

original: I think that everything I've done and been through will get in the way between us. And I don't want to hurt you with my burdens.
string: 我担心自己的过往会成为我们之间的隔阂。我也不愿让你背负我的伤痛。

original: Had I met you before all that, I would have told you the three words without hesitation, but... I lost my chance centuries ago.
string: 若是在经历这一切之前遇见你，我一定会毫不犹豫说出那三个字，可……我在数百年前就失去了这个机会。

original: You deserve more than a broken woman who can't move on.
string: 你值得一位更好的女士，而不是一个困在过去的残破灵魂。

original: No. I'll wait until you can.
string: 不。我会一直等到你释怀的那天。

original: Even if it was possible, do you realize how long it would take me to do that? You can't waste your life waiting for a miracle that won't happen!
string: 即便真有那种可能，你又怎么知道我要多久才能走出来？你不能把人生浪费在等待永远不会发生的奇迹上！

original: Nor can I leave you hurting. You know I can help you.
string: 我也无法放任你独自承受痛苦。你知道我能帮你。

original: I know you want to. Just as I know that this part of my life exists.
string: 我明白你渴望倾诉。正如我清楚这段往事始终存在。

original: And I know that if I share my life with you, I will have to share all of this hurt as well. And I'm terrified of taking that path.
string: 我更知道若与你分享我的人生，就不得不将这些伤痛一并托出。可我畏惧踏上那条道路。

original: I made it this far by keeping it closed shut. I feel sick whenever I gaze upon what's inside, and as long as it stays the way it is...
string: 我始终紧闭着心门才走到了今天。每次窥见内心都几度令我窒息，我只求它维持原状……

original: We won't be able to have a normal relationship. Not while I can't even start to walk down that road.
string: 我们无法维持正常的关系。在我连踏上那条路的起点都做不到的时候，更不可能。

original: We'll walk it at your own pace. Move forward when you feel ready.
string: 我们可以按你的步调来。等你准备好了再出发。

original: And if I can't?
string: 如果我做不到呢？

original: Then take the ring. It's my promise to walk this path beside you.
string: 那么，收下这枚戒指吧。这是我与你并肩同行的承诺。

original: I need you to close your eyes.
string: 我需要你闭上眼睛。

original: Don't move. Don't do anything. Just... I have to do this without you holding my hand.
string: 不要动，什么都别做。就这样……这次我必须自己来做。

original: Serana?
string: 瑟拉娜？

original: You can... You can open them now.
string: 现在……你可以睁开了。

original: Thank you for doing what I asked.
string: 谢谢你照我说的去做。

original: Was this hard for you?
string: 这对你来说很难吗？

original: It terrified me. But I don't think I would have gotten another chance to face myself. I had to push through all that held me back. Just this once.
string: 这让我感到恐惧。但我不认为自己还会有另一个面对自我的机会。我必须冲破所有阻碍——就这一次。

original: So you found your answer then?
string: 所以你找到答案了？

original: Yes. I did.
string: 是的，我找到了。

original: It's still hard for me to get so close to you. I can't promise we'll have a proper relationship until I'm ready to let go of all that.
string: 对我来说，像这样靠近你依然很难。在我准备好放下一切之前，我无法承诺我们会拥有一段正常的关系。

original: But I promise you that I'll commit to us. I am not letting go of what I feel for you.
string: 但我向你保证，我会为了我们全力以赴。我绝不会放弃对你的这份感情。

original: It will take me a long time, but when I'm no longer afraid, I'll properly tell you how I feel. And I'll accept whatever future you have for us.
string: 这将花费我很长时间，但当我不再害怕时，我会好好地告诉你我的感受。我也会接受你为我们勾勒的任何未来。

original: You're keeping the ring too?
string: 这枚戒指你也打算留着吗？

original: Of course. It's lovely!
string: 当然！它多漂亮啊！

original: Seems to have cost a fortune too.
string: 看起来也价格不菲呢。

original: Don't mention it. It was worth it.
string: 不客气，这很值得。

original: Yeah, it really was.
string: 是啊，确实如此。

original: Acknowledging these feelings has taught me more about myself than just repressing them.
string: 承认这些感受让我更了解自己，而不只是压抑它们。

original: I know I've said this before, but I'm glad you're the one who woke me up that day.
string: 我知道我之前有说过，但我很高兴那天是你叫醒了我。

original: Can't you just feed on someone else?
string: 你就不能吸别人的血吗？

original: It's not that simple.
string: 事情没那么简单。

original: I can't quite put my finger on it, but there's something special about your blood. Just a few drops were able to revitalize me for a few minutes.
string: 我也说不上来，但你的血很特别，只是几滴就让我恢复了几分钟精力。

original: If I take a normal dose, I should be able to go on for the rest of the journey. As long as you consent to this.
string: 只要能正常摄取一次，应该足够支撑我走完剩下的路程——前提是你同意。

original: Do you have a spare potion of blood?
string: 你有多余的血药水吗？

original: Yeah. I brewed one this morning. I'll have another one prepared for tomorrow.
string: 是的。我今天早上多做了一杯。我明天还会再准备一杯的。

original: And... Don't ask me where I took the blood from.
string: 呃……别问我是从哪搞来血的。

original: Yeah, I brew some earlier today. Here you go.
string: 是的，我今天早些时候做了一些。给你。

original: That's all I have for today. Ask me again tomorrow if you run out.
string: 这是我今天所有的了。如果你用完了，明天再问我吧。

original: Do you have some spare potions?
string: 你有一些备用药水吗？

original: Can you cook something for me?
string: 你能给我做点吃的吗？

original: You know I've been feeding on blood for most of my life, do you?
string: 你知道我大半段时间都在吸血，对吧？

original: Even before I became a vampire, I had people cook for me. I know for a fact I've never touched a cooking pit.
string: 在我变成吸血鬼之前，就有人替我做饭了。我敢肯定自己从没碰过灶台。

original: Why don't you cook something for me?
string: 为什么不能是“你”给我下厨呢？

original: Wait, what?
string: 等等，什么？

original: Yeah! I'm really curious to see what your cooking tastes like! I just recovered my sense of taste, remember?
string: 是啊！我对你做出的味道可真是很好奇呢！我刚恢复味觉没多久，记得吧？

original: Tell you what. Let's make it transactional. You make me a homecooked meal, and I'll make you a special potion I've been working on. Deal?
string: 这样吧，我们来做个交易。你给我做顿家常菜，我就给你一瓶——我最近刚研制的药水，可好？

original: What does that potion do?
string: 那药水是做什么的？

original: It's an experiment I've worked on. A potion with multiple effects. I almost have completed the formula, so you'll make for a perfect test sub--
string: 这是我正在实验中的，它具有多重功效。我差不多要完成它的配方了，你正好可以当完美的测试对——

original: D-don't worry about it.
string: 没、没什么好担心的。

original: Are you hungry? I've cooked something for you.
string: 你饿了吗？我给你做了些吃的。

original: Yeah! I was about to ask you for something to eat! It smells heavenly!
string: 好耶！我正想找你要点吃的呢！这闻起来可太香了！

original: Here's your potion, as promised. This turned out to be a good investment, don't you think?
string: 这是答应给你的药水。这笔交易很划算吧，你觉得呢？

original: Serana?
string: 瑟拉娜？

original: Yes?
string: 嗯？

original: That ring... Is that what I think it is?
string: 那枚戒指……是我想的那样吗？

original: It's... Well, it's complicated.
string: 这个……好吧，说起来有点复杂。

original: But to make a long story short, it represents a promise.
string: 但长话短说，它代表着一个承诺。

original: For both of us.
string: 对我们两人来说。

original: And you're happy?
string: 那你开心吗？

original: Yes. More than ever.
string: 是呢，我比任何时候都开心。

original: Then that is all that I need to know.
string: 那我就放心了。

original: Nothing would bring me more joy than seeing you head towards the future you fought so hard for.
string: 能见证你拼尽全力奔赴的未来——没有比这更让我欣慰的事了。

original: You earned this, Serana! I wouldn't dream of standing in your way.
string: 这是你应得的，瑟拉娜！我绝不会成为你的阻碍。

original: Thank you, mother. That really means a lot to me.
string: 谢谢你，母亲。这对我意义重大。

original: I'll let you know when we're ready to follow through on that promise.
string: 等我们准备好履行承诺时，我会告诉您的。

original: Are you going to interview me?
string: 您是要“考察”我吗？

original: Pardon?
string: 什么？

original: Ah! Serana told you about those, did she? I presume she told you about the headaches she caused me as well?
string: 啊！瑟拉娜跟你提过那些事，是吧？我想她也说了，当年她是怎么让我各种头疼的？

original: What a rebellious child she was! No wonder her sights were always on the horizon. She wasn't meant for a life like mine.
string: 她小时候可多叛逆啊！也难怪她总望着远处。她注定过不了我这样的人生。

original: So to answer your question, no. I won't interview you. I'm no longer the controlling mother I used to be. I almost lost my daughter because of it.
string: 所以你那个问题的答案是：不，我不会考察你的。我不再是那个控制欲很强的母亲了。我差点因为这个失去我的女儿。

original: Speaking of which, are you planning on taking her to the altar?
string: 话说回来，你打算和她结婚吗？

original: I wish I could, but she finds herself unworthy of facing the Divines.
string: 我当然想了，可她觉得她不配面对圣灵们。

original: I figured as much. The Divines wouldn't smile upon her and I after what we did in the past. She's much more mature than I gave her credit for.
string: 我也这么觉得。圣灵们是不会垂青——过去做了那些事的我们的。她远比我想象的要更成熟了。

original: I can see you're a religious individual, so I appreciate you respecting her boundaries.
string: 我看得出来你是虔诚的人，谢谢你尊重她的选择。

original: We agreed not to talk about it. For me it's enough that she accepted my feelings
string: 我们约好不再聊这件事了。对我来说，她愿意接受我的心意便已经足够。

original: Thank you. I was afraid you'd force her into a life she wasn't ready for, but it's good to know you're willing to wait for her sake.
string: 谢谢。我还担心你会强求她面对尚未准备好的生活，但你却愿意为了她而等待，我真的很高兴。

original: We don't need the Divines' approval to be together.
string: 我们之间不需要圣灵的认可。

original: Ohh. Looks like you're set on teaching the gods their limits, are you? I respect that.
string: 哦豁。看来你是打定主意，要让神灵们认清自己的界限了，对吗？我欣赏你的气魄。

original: So you approve of me?
string: 所以您认可我了吗？

original: My approval is of no consequence. Serana is old enough to make her own choices, and I trust her judgment.
string: 我的认可无关紧要。瑟拉娜已经足够成熟了，她能为自己做决定，我也信任她的判断。

original: I barely know you, but you've gone through greater lengths than I to save her. If that isn't love, then I don't know what is.
string: 我虽然和你认识得不久，但你为了拯救她所付出的要远胜于我。如果这都算不上爱，我也无话可说了。

original: I can think of no one more deserving of being by her side than you.
string: 没有人比你更有资格陪在她身边了。

original: With that being said, if I ever learn that you broke her heart... I will feast on yours.
string: 话虽如此，但如果我有一天得知你伤了她的心……我会让你也尝尝她的感受。

original: I don't want to talk about it. It's embarrassing.
string: 我不想聊这个，太尴尬了。

original: It's alright. I can guess how it happened.
string: 没关系，我大概能猜到是怎么回事了。

original: The sarcophagus absorbed the blood you lost and nourished me with it. Even if it was just a little, it was enough to revitalize me for a while.
string: 石棺吸收了你流出的血液，并用它滋养我。哪怕只是一点点，也足够我恢复些精神了。

original: However... I haven't fed in what feels like ages. I didn't notice how weak I was earlier, but now that I've stretched my legs...
string: 不过……我感觉我已经很久没有进食了。之前还没啥感觉，但现在手脚都活动开后……

original: Look, this is awkward. You can guess where this is going, can't you?
string: 嗯，这有点尴尬。但你应该能猜到的，对吧？

original: Yeah. And it's the last time I'm pressing a random button. Ever.
string: 是啊。而且我以后再也不会乱按按钮了。

original: Ha ha ha ha!
string: 哈哈哈哈！

original: Sorry.
string: 对不起。

original: So what was this about?
string: 那么这是关于什么的？

original: The sarcophagus absorbed the blood you lost and nourished me with it. Even if it was just a little, it was enough to revitalize me for a while.
string: 石棺吸收了你流出的血液，并用它滋养我。哪怕只是一点点，也足够我恢复些精神了。

original: However... I haven't fed in what feels like ages. I didn't notice how weak I was earlier, but now that I've stretched my legs...
string: 不过……我感觉我已经很久没有进食了。之前还没啥感觉，但现在手脚都活动开后……

original: Look, this is awkward. You can guess where this is going, can't you?
string: 嗯，这有点尴尬。但你应该能猜到的，对吧？

original: Good luck dear. I'm sure she'll love it!
string: 祝你好运，亲爱的。我相信她一定会喜欢的！

original: I still need some time to figure things out.
string: 我还需要些时间理清头绪。

original: Um... Any reason you brought me here?
string: 嗯……你带我来这里是有什么原因吗？

original: Yeah. Enjoy your meal.
string: 啊，请慢用。

original: Thank you.
string: 谢谢。

original: Yes, though you seem to be coming out better off.
string: 确实，不过看起来你更占便宜呢。

original: I can't deny your cooking will taste better. And I won't complain.
string: 我承认你做的菜要更美味。我可不会抱怨这个。

original: Thank you for doing this much for me.
string: 谢谢你为我做这么多。

original: Don't mention it. I love seeing you smile.
string: 不用客气。我最爱看你笑了。

original: Don't get all cheesy on me!
string: 少来这套肉麻的！

original: But... It makes me happy. Thanks.
string: 不过……我确实很开心。谢谢你。

original: I can't wait to see the day.
string: 我期待着那一天的到来。

original: I'm so happy to see you two together. What can I do for you?
string: 我很高兴看到你俩在一起。有什么需要我帮忙的吗？

original: I do expect you to follow a certain code of etiquette. Our family has standards, you see.
string: 我确实希望你能遵守一定的礼仪规范。我们家族是有门槛的，你明白吧。

original: Hey.
string: 嘿。

original: If I find out you ever hurt Serana, you're one dead man!
string: 要是让我知道你伤害了瑟拉娜，你就死定了！

original: If I find out you ever hurt Serana, you're one dead woman!
string: 要是让我知道你伤害了瑟拉娜，你就死定了！

original: I'm so glad we took that step together.
string: 我很高兴我们能共同迈出这一步。

original: Just so we're clear, we're not using nicknames. Ever.
string: 先把话说清楚，我们之间不要用昵称。永远也不。

original: Thank you for not giving up on me.
string: 谢谢你没有放弃我。

original: Here we are...
string: 我们到了……

original: Unequip your circlet.
string: 摘下你的头环吧。

original: Oh. Alright.
string: 哦，行吧。

original: Thought you'd never ask.
string: 还以为你不会开口呢。

original: Equip your circlet back.
string: 把头环戴回去吧。

original: I was just wondering... Do you see us togther?
string: 我在想……你觉得我们有“一起”的可能吗？

original: You're sweet. And... I'm not stupid. I can see what you're getting at.
string: 你很招人喜欢。然后……我也不笨，明白你的意思。

original: Look. you're great. Really, but... I just don't think that's for us.
string: 听着，你真的很优秀。真的，但是……我只是觉得我们不太“合适”。

original: Especially not me. I mean... With my history, I still kinda get a chill walking by a temple. Can't imagine going into one.
string: 尤其是“我”。我是说……以我的经历，我走过神殿的时候都还会不寒而栗，实在没法想象就这样走进去祈祷。

original: Given how I've lived... What I've done... I can't ask the gods for a blessing like that.
string: 以我这样的生活方式……和我曾做过的事……我怎能向神明祈求这样的恩赐。

original: It's just... It's not for me.
string: 这根本……是不属于我的。

original: At the Tempo of our Heartbeats
string: 心跳节拍

original: I wanted to take Serana on a dance, but I made her uncomfortable. I should wait until tomorrow and apologize.
string: 我想邀请瑟拉娜跳舞，却让她感到不适。我应该等到明天再道歉。

original: I wanted to take Serana on a dance, but I made her uncomfortable. I should apologize now that things have calmed down between us.
string: 我想邀请瑟拉娜跳舞，却让她感到不适。既然现在我们已经平静下来，我应该当即道歉了。

original: I wanted to take Serana on a dance, but I made her uncomfortable. When I tried to apologize, she requested to continue this conversation in Castle Volkihar's courytard. I should take her there to apoligize.
string: 我想邀请瑟拉娜跳舞，却让她感到不适。当我尝试道歉时，她请求移步到沃基哈尔城堡的庭院继续谈话。我应该带她去那里道歉。

original: I wanted to take Serana on a dance, but I made her uncomfortable. After talking it out in her castle's courtyard, we decided to take the step together and dance. She was afraid, but she pushed through and we had a very memorable time. I'm glad we're slowly overcoming her traumas and that she's learing to love herself despite what she did in her past.
string: 我想邀请瑟拉娜跳舞，却让她感到不适。在城堡庭院谈心之后，我们决定共同迈出这一步——共舞。她虽然害怕，但还是克服了恐惧，我们共度了一段难忘的时光。很高兴我们正在慢慢克服她过去的创伤，她也逐渐学会接纳过去的自己。

original: Talk to Serana tomorrow
string: 等到明天和瑟拉娜交谈

original: Talk to Serana
string: 和瑟拉娜交谈

original: Take Serana to the Castle Courtyard
string: 带瑟拉娜去城堡庭院

original: Talk to Serana
string: 和瑟拉娜交谈

original: Before reaching the Ancestor Glade to learn the location of Auriel's Bow, Serana pointed out that we'd need to be extra prepared just in case. We'll depart to Whiterun to buy some potions at Arcadia's Calduron and deliver her a note.
string: 在抵达先祖林地寻找奥瑞艾尔之弓的下落之前，瑟拉娜提醒我们需要格外做好准备以防万一。我们将前往白漫城，在阿尔凯迪雅之釜购买药剂，并帮她捎去一封信。

original: Before reaching the Ancestor Glade to learn the location of Auriel's Bow, Serana pointed out that we'd need to be extra prepared just in case. The potions we were going to buy were rather expensive, but Arcadia offered us a discount in exchange of finding Braith before she does something with her experimental potion.
string: 在抵达先祖林地寻找奥瑞艾尔之弓的下落之前，瑟拉娜提醒我们需要格外做好准备以防万一。我们要买的药剂相当昂贵，但阿尔凯迪雅答应给我们打折，但条件是在布赖斯用她的实验药剂惹出乱子之前找到她。

original: After agreeing to help Arcadia with her little problem with Braith, we asked around town. We were told to look for her up in the Cloud District, but outside Dragonsreach.
string: 在答应帮阿尔凯迪雅解决布赖斯这个小麻烦后，我们在镇上打听了一番。得知要去云顶区找她，但不在龙临宫里面。

original: We found Braith uncooperative. Serana seems convinced to be able to yield results. Maybe I should let her handle it.
string: 我们发现布赖斯很不配合。瑟拉娜似乎确信自己能问出结果。也许我该让她来处理。

original: Serana managed not only to convince Braith to gives us the potion back, but to help her with her own problems in a possitive way. We should return to Arcadia now.
string: 瑟拉娜不仅成功说服布赖斯归还药剂，还以积极的方式帮助她解决了自己的问题。我们现在该回去找阿尔凯迪雅了。

original: Serana managed not only to convince Braith to gives us the potion back, but to help her with her own problems in a possitive way. We should return to Arcadia now.
string: 瑟拉娜不仅成功说服布赖斯归还药剂，还以积极的方式帮助她解决了自己的问题。我们现在该回去找阿尔凯迪雅了。

original: After our little misadventure to Whiterun to get potions half the price, we were able to help Braith in the process. I should ask Serana how she felt about this experience.
string: 在我们这趟以半价购得药剂的白漫城小插曲之后，还顺带帮助了布赖斯。我该问问瑟拉娜对这次经历的感受。

original: Before reaching the Ancestor Glade to learn the location of Auriel's Bow, Serana pointed out that we'd need to be extra prepared just in case. The potions we were going to buy were rather expensive, but Arcadia offered us a discount in exchange of finding Braith before she did something with her experimental potion. When we located her, we realized she wanted to use it on her crush, Lars, so Serana helped her approach this matter in a healthy way and Braith in return gave us the potion back. Arcadia rewarded us by giving us a discount with the potions. Serana walked away out of this adventure happily, having made a friend.
string: 在抵达先祖林地寻找奥瑞艾尔之弓的下落之前，瑟拉娜提醒我们需要格外做好准备以防万一。我们打算购买的药剂原本相当昂贵，但阿尔凯迪雅承诺给我们折扣，条件是在布赖斯用她的实验药剂惹出麻烦之前找到她。找到布赖斯后，我们发现她原本想对心仪对象拉斯使用药剂，瑟拉娜便引导她以更健康的方式处理这份感情，而布赖斯也因此将药剂归还。阿尔凯迪雅履行承诺给予我们购药折扣。瑟拉娜在这场意外插曲中结识了新朋友，心满意足地离开了。

string: 与阿尔凯迪雅交谈

string: 向瑟拉娜说明情况

string: 打听布赖斯的下落

string: 向米拉·巴伦西亚询问布赖斯

string: 找到布赖斯

string: 让瑟拉娜来处理

string: 将药剂归还给阿尔凯迪雅

original: Food
string: 食物

original: Ambivalence
string: 矛盾心境

original: I confronted Serana about my feelings for her. I was prepared to be rejected, but she actually admitted to feel something for me. However, she seems to feel insecure about it because of what she's been through in her past, believing that she doesn't deserve this happiness. I need to do something to show her that she's worthy of my feelings for her. Maybe if I were to give her a gift that could convey my feelings, like a ring, it may help her clear her doubrs. Fralia Grey-Mane's jewelry has a decent repitation. Maybe she can craft that ring for me.
string: 我向瑟拉娜坦白了我对她的感情。本以为会遭到拒绝，没想到她竟承认也对我有心意。只是她似乎因过往经历而心存不安，认为自己不配拥有这份幸福。我必须做点什么让她明白，她完全值得我的倾慕。或许送她一枚能传递心意的戒指，就能消除她的疑虑。法利亚·灰鬃的首饰工艺颇负盛名，说不定能请她为我打造这枚戒指。

original: I confronted Serana about my feelings for her. I was prepared to be rejected, but she actually admitted to feel something for me. However, she seems to feel insecure about it because of what she's been through in her past, believing that she doesn't deserve this happiness. Later, I hired Fralia Grey-Mane to craft a ring for me. She said she'll have it ready in a day.
string: 我向瑟拉娜坦白了心意。原以为会被拒绝，没想到她承认也对我怀有同样的感情。只是她似乎因过往经历而心存不安，觉得自己不配拥有这份幸福。后来我委托法利亚·灰鬃打造了一枚戒指，她说次日就能完工。

original: I confronted Serana about my feelings for her. I was prepared to be rejected, but she actually admitted to feel something for me. However, she seems to feel insecure about it because of what she's been through in her past, believing that she doesn't deserve this happiness. Later, I hired Fralia Grey-Mane to craft a ring for me. She should have it ready now.
string: 我向瑟拉娜坦白了心意。虽然已经做好被拒绝的准备，但她竟然坦言对我也有好感。只是她因过往经历而显得忐忑不安，认为自己不配拥有这份幸福。后来我委托法利亚·灰鬃打造了一枚戒指，现在应该已经完工了。

original: I confronted Serana about my feelings for her. I was prepared to be rejected, but she actually admitted to feel something for me. However, she seems to feel insecure about it because of what she's been through in her past, believing that she doesn't deserve this happiness. I bought a ring from Fralia Grey-Mane, who told me that I shouldn't just give it to Serana in any place. It has to be somewhere special. I think the castle courtyard is the best option. That's where we truly began to grow closer.
string: 我向瑟拉娜坦露了心声。本已做好被拒绝的准备，没想到她竟承认对我也有情意。只是她因往事而心怀忐忑，觉得自己不配拥有这份幸福。我从法利亚·灰鬃那里购得一枚戒指，她特地叮嘱我不该随意择地相赠，而需择一处别有深意之所。我想城堡庭院正是最佳选择——那正是我们真正开始心意相通的故地。

original: I confronted Serana about my feelings for her. I was prepared to be rejected, but she actually admitted to feel something for me. However, she seems to feel insecure about it because of what she's been through in her past, believing that she doesn't deserve this happiness. I bought a ring from Fralia Grey-Mane and gave it to Serana in the castle courtyard. After our heart-to-heart conversation, she accepted the ring and kissed me, but said that she wasn't truly prepared for a relationhip yet. She'll need time, but I don't mind. I truly want her to be happy.
string: 我向瑟拉娜坦白了对她的感情。本以为会被拒绝，没想到她竟承认也对我有感觉。但由于过往经历，她对此感到不安，认为自己不配拥有这份幸福。我从法利亚·灰鬃那里买了一枚戒指，在城堡庭院里送给了她。经过倾心交谈后，她收下戒指并亲吻了我，但表示自己尚未真正准备好开始恋情。她需要时间，而我愿意等待。惟愿她能真正获得幸福。

original: Ask Fralia Grey-Mane to craft you a ring for Serana
string: 请法利亚·灰鬃为瑟拉娜打造一枚戒指

original: Wait for Fralia to have the ring ready
string: 等待法利亚完成戒指制作

original: Pick up the ring from Fralia Grey-Mane
string: 向法利亚·灰鬃取回戒指

original: Give the ring to Serana in Castle Volkihar's Courtyard
string: 在沃基哈尔城堡庭院将戒指赠予瑟拉娜

original: The Bleeding Flower
string: 染血之花

original: Serana told me that she hasn't fed in years and requested me to donate some blood for her to feed on. In order to make this as painless and easy as possible, it's better if I fall asleep, so I should find a safe place to rest and let her feed.
string: 瑟拉娜说她多年没有进食了，想请我提供一些血液。为了让这个过程轻松些，最好是我先睡着，得找个安全的地方休息让她进食。

original: Serana told me that she hasn't fed in years and requested me to donate some blood for her to feed on. After finding a safe location I fell asleep and had a strange dream. I should talk to Serana and make sure everything went alright.
string: 瑟拉娜说她多年没有进食了，想请我提供一些血液。我在安全的地方睡着后做了个奇怪的梦，该问问瑟拉娜是否一切顺利。

original: Serana told me that she hasn't fed in years and requested me to donate some blood for her to feed on. After finding a safe location I fell asleep and had a strange dream. Serana told me she's in top condition and that I should just take it slow, but we should move on.
string: 瑟拉娜说她多年没有进食了，想请我提供一些血液。我在安全的地方睡着后做了个奇怪的梦。瑟拉娜说自己状态很好，让我别着急，但我们该继续赶路了。

original: Serana told me that she hasn't fed in years and requested me to donate some blood for her to feed on. Sadly, I forgot about it and reached her home before finding a place to sleep. She reprimaned me for it.
string: 瑟拉娜说她多年没有进食了，想请我提供一些血液。可惜我忘了这事，没找地方睡觉就直接到了她家，为此被她责备了一顿。

original: Find a place to sleep (tavern recommended)
string: 找个地方睡觉（建议去酒馆）

original: Talk to Serana
string: 和瑟拉娜交谈

original: Solitude in Company
string: 结伴独孤城

original: Serana expressed her desire to explore the city of Solitude, so I offered myself as her guide. We should head there while I come up with something fun to do.
string: 瑟拉娜说想去独孤城逛逛，我主动提出当她的向导。我们该出发了，路上正好想想有什么有趣的活动。

original: Serana expressed her desire to explore the city of Solitude, so I offered myself as her guide. Once we got there, I asked her what she wanted to do, but she's the one who expected me to have the tour planned. Taking her to the Solitude Windmill should be a good start, but I have to come up with a plan afterwards...
string: 瑟拉娜说想去独孤城逛逛，我主动提出当她的向导。到了城里我问她想做什么，没想到她反而期待我来规划行程。带她去参观独孤城风车应该不错，但之后还得再安排些活动……

original: Serana expressed her desire to explore the city of Solitude, so I offered myself as her guide. After visiting the Bridge, I proposed Serana to visit the College. She didn't seem very enthusiastic about it, but wasn't against it either. Let's go there and then decide what to do afterwards.
string: 瑟拉娜说想去独孤城逛逛，我主动提出当她的向导。走过城门桥后，我提议去吟游诗人学院看看。她虽然不太热衷但也没反对，先去那儿再决定后续行程吧。

original: Serana expressed her desire to explore the city of Solitude, so I offered myself as her guide. After taking a brief peek at the Bards College's exterior, I suggested her to buy herself a souvenir. She liked the idea, so we're heading to Radiant Raiment.
string: 瑟拉娜说想去独孤城逛逛，我主动提出当她的向导。在吟游诗人学院外观光片刻后，我建议她买件纪念品。这个主意很合她心意，我们正往锦衣服饰店走去。

original: I took Serana to the Radiant Raiment and she became interested in buying a certain circlet. Unfortunately, when she was going to pay for it, she realized that she brought coins from another era. After asking for advice, I suggested her to ask the Jarl for a job. We should head to the Blue Palace at once.
string: 我带瑟拉娜来到锦衣服饰店，她看中了一款头环。可惜结账时才发现她带的钱币都是旧时代的货币。询问建议后，我让她去找领主谋份差事。我们得立即动身前往蓝宫。

original: After talking to Jarl Elisif, she gave us a job herself. We have to find a thief at Kilkreath Temple and retrieve the scroll he stole. There's a chance he may not be alone, so we have to be prepared for a fight.
string: 与艾利西弗领主交谈后，她亲自交给了我们一项任务：前往基尔克瑞斯神殿找到一个盗贼，夺回他偷走的卷轴。那个盗贼很可能还有同伙，我们必须做好战斗准备。

original: We reached Kilkreath and found a Solitude Guard waiting with two bandits. As Jarl Elisif suspected, he's the one who stole her husband's scroll. The thieves won't listen to reason. We must take the scroll by force!
string: 我们抵达基尔克瑞斯，发现一名独孤城卫兵带着两名强盗正在等候。正如艾利西弗领主所料，就是他偷走了她丈夫的卷轴。这些盗贼根本听不进道理，我们只能动手夺回卷轴了！

original: I can't believe he fell for it...
string: 真不敢相信他居然中计了……

original: We reached Kilkreath and found a Solitude Guard waiting with two bandits. We faced them, but we emerged victorious and managed to retrieve Torygg's Scroll. I should talk to Serana.
string: 我们抵达基尔克瑞斯，发现一名独孤城卫兵与两名强盗在此等候。经过交战，我们成功夺回了托依格的卷轴。该和瑟拉娜谈谈了。

original: We reached Kilkreath and found a Solitude guard waiting with two bandits, who turned out to be the thieves. We faced them, but we emerged victorious and managed to retrieve Torygg's Scroll. We should now return the scroll to Elisif and confront her about what the corrupt guard told us.
string: 将卷轴交还给艾利西弗并听她讲述完往事后，她支付给我们每人500赛普汀。现在瑟拉娜有足够的钱去买她在锦衣服饰店看中的那个头环了。

original: After returning the scroll to Elisif and hearing her story out, she paid us 500 septims each. Now Serana has more than enough to buy that circlet she fancied in Radiant Raiment.
string: 在将卷轴交还给艾利西弗并听她讲述完整件事的来龙去脉后，她付给了我们每人500赛普汀。现在瑟拉娜有足够的钱去锦衣服饰店买下她心仪的那个头环了。

original: After sidetracking from our little tour, we finally were able to buy Serana the circlet she fancied. We should leave the shop and decide what to do next.
string: 经过这段插曲，我们总算顺利买到了瑟拉娜心心念念的头环。该离开店铺决定接下来的行程了。

original: Serana expressed her desire to explore the city of Solitude, so I offered myself as her guide. Among other things, we decided to find a job so that Serana could buy herself a circlet, and fortunately, Jarl Elisif had one for us. After getting the job done and earning our keep, Serana bought her circlet and we decided to head back. It certainly was an exhausting ordeal, but we had fun. I wish we could do something like this again.
string: 瑟拉娜曾说想游览独孤城，我便自告奋勇担任她的向导。除了观光之外，我们还特意找了份差事好让她能买下心仪的头环——很幸运，艾利西弗领主正好有任务委托。完成工作赚取报酬后，瑟拉娜终于如愿以偿，我们决定启程返回。这趟旅程虽然颇费周折，但我们都乐在其中。真希望以后还能再有这样的经历。

original: Take Serana to Solitude
string: 带瑟拉娜前往独孤城

original: Take Serana to the Solitude Windmill
string: 带瑟拉娜参观独孤城的风车

original: Take Serana to the Bards College
string: 带瑟拉娜前往吟游诗人学院

original: Visit Taarie in the Radiant Raiment
string: 拜访锦衣服饰店的塔瑞

original: Find a job for Serana
string: 为瑟拉娜找份工作

original: Find the thief and retrieve Torygg's scroll
string: 找到盗贼并夺回托依格的卷轴

original: Talk to Serana
string: 和瑟拉娜交谈

original: Return to Jarl Elisif
string: 返回向艾利西弗领主复命

original: Meet up with Taarie in the Radiant Raiment
string: 到锦衣服饰店与塔瑞会面

original: Talk to Serana outside the shop
string: 在店铺外与瑟拉娜交谈

original:
You nod and close your eyes. For a while nothing happens, but you don't react. Then the idea of her choosing to leave without even telling you crosses your mind. It frightens you, but you know her enough to know that she wouldn't hurt you like that. You trust her, and so you wait, as you promised. Then her fingers caress the back of your hand. Your heartbeat raises, but you try to control your expectations. Her fingers reach to the ring you were holding in that hand. You don't resist. You don't take advantage of the situation. As soon as she takes a hold of the ring, her fingers slip away as slowly as they reach out to you. You no longer feel her touch. Nothing happens for a while, and the thoughts of her leaving you invade your mind again. Maybe she needs time to come to terms with this, but you don't want to be separated from her. 
Opening your eyes to find out scares you, but then you feel relief when her fingers caress your cheeks. You know she's close. Your heart feels like it's about to burst and your breath needs to compensate. Her hands surround your neck. You feel her breath, but you also notice her hesitation. 'Maybe I should lean forward', you think. But no. You promised you wouldn't do anything. You clench your fists and summon all your strength to stay calm and make this easy for her. You wait. Her breath grows closer, and your lips touch. Your whole body finally relaxes. No words are needed anymore. She has given you her answer. Her lips part from yours.
string:
你点头闭上双眼。须臾间万籁俱寂，你却始终未动。而后，她或许会不告而别的念头掠过你的心头，这念头令你心悸，但你已深深了解她，知晓她绝不会如此伤你。你信她，于是如约等待。直到她的指尖轻抚过你的手背。心跳骤然加速，你却强压期待。她的指尖探向你手中紧握的戒指。你未曾抗拒，也没有趁势索求。她摘下戒指的刹那，那曾触碰你的指尖又如来时一般缓缓抽离。温存乍逝。片刻寂静中，她将离开的不安再度侵蚀心扉。或许她需要时间适应，但你绝不愿与她分离。
睁眼确认实情令你恐惧，但当她的指尖轻抚你脸颊时，你又感到如释重负。你感知到她的贴近，心脏轰鸣，呼吸也失去了节奏。她的双手双臂环住你的脖颈。你感受到她的气息，却也察觉到她的踌躇。“或许我该主动些”，你暗自思忖。但不行。你承诺过不会越界。你紧握双拳，竭力保持镇定，努力让她能够放松。你等待着。她的气息渐近，双唇相触时，全身的紧绷终得舒缓。不再需要言语。她已交出答案。她的唇瓣缓缓离开。

original: Serana's gratitude fills you with joy
string: 瑟拉娜的感激让你满心欢喜

original: You close your eyes and let your mind go blank. You find yourself in a black void, but you're not floating. The soil is filled with water, or so you think until you look down. It's blood. Everywhere, as far as the eye can see, but it's not very deep. You can walk, so you may as well move forward. As the ripples of your footsteps disturb its harmony, your mind tries to find a logical explanation for this phenomenon. 'Whose blood is this?' 'How many people had to be sacrificed in order to fill this entire void?' Curiosity and fear of the unknown wage war to decide whether or not you should know the answer. You stop as you hear a human sound. Sounds young. Female, maybe. A cry? You rush towards its source and see a girl on the horizon, laying in a fetal position. You gasp in horror at the sight of her naked body, covered in cuts, bruises and burns, but her arms only protect her belly. She's shaking, sobbing, and doesn't react to your presence. Behind you, a middle-aged man and a woman. Both are ignoring you and looking directly at her, nodding in approval. The blood sea's peace is disrupted. Ripples come out of everywhere as the ground shakes. A thousand screams plead for mercy. The girl, terrified, looks at where the ripples are most violent, from which a giant emerges. A skull-faced monster with flaming blue eyes that burn through your very soul. The girl screams at the top of her lungs as it tries to grab her. You ignore all your survival instincts to push her out of the way, and the monster devours you instead. You're choked almost to death, hurt from the inside and deeply terrified. Something that should have been intimate and beautiful was desecrated and tarnished forever. At the very least, you spared that girl from this unspeakable evil. As your mind tries to process what you just went through, a soothing, sad voice whispers: 'Was this my punishment for the price I paid?'. The pain suddenly fades away. Besides a sting on your neck, your body feels perfectly fine. You find yourself in the same room as you fell asleep, with Serana standing beside you. It was all just a nightmare.
string: 你阖上双眼，任由思绪沉入虚无。此刻你正立于一片黑色虚空，却并未漂浮。脚下土地被水浸满，直到你低头望去。是血。目之所及皆是血海，但血还不算深。既然能行走，不如向前迈步。涟漪随着脚步扰乱调谐，你的理智竭力为这异象寻找合理解释：“这是谁的血？”“要献祭多少人才能填满这整片虚空？”好奇心与对未知的恐惧在脑中激烈交战，决定着你是否该知晓答案。人声让你骤然驻足。听起来很年轻。或许是女性。是啜泣吗？你冲向声源，看见地平线上蜷缩着少女的身影。她赤裸身躯布满割伤、淤青与灼痕，双臂却只护着腹部。她颤抖呜咽着，对你的存在毫无反应。 在你身后，站着一对中年男女。两人对你视若无睹，只是盯着女孩，频频颔首。血海忽然沸腾。大地震动间，涟漪从四面八方涌现。千百声哀嚎在乞求宽恕。少女惊恐地望向涟漪最汹涌处，巨物正从那里浮现；骷髅面孔的怪物，燃烧的蓝焰双眼灼烧着你的灵魂。当它试图攫取女孩时，她发出撕心裂肺的尖叫。你压制所有求生本能将她推开，怪物转而将你吞噬。窒息与内脏撕裂的剧痛中，你意识到某种本应亲热美好的事物被永远玷污。但至少，你让那女孩免遭这不可言说的邪恶。当你的思绪试图梳理刚刚经历的一切时，一道悲伤而温柔的耳语响起：“这就是我付出代价应得的惩罚吗？”痛苦突然消散。除了脖子上的一阵刺痛，你的身体完好无损。你发现自己仍在入睡时的房间里，瑟拉娜正站在你身旁。这一切都只是场噩梦。

original:
You offer Serana your hand. She hesitates at first, but slowly, she takes it, and places the other one on your shoulder. Knowing your boundaries, you place your other hand on her shoulder too instead of her waist. She keeps some distance between your bodies and avoids eye contact for now. Both of you start moving, and even though there's no music to guide your steps, you find your own rhythm. You're nervous about having her so close, but also worried that this may be too hard for her. Then your eyes meet for a second before you both look away. 
Her hand slowly moves from your shoulder to your back, and her body gets closer to yours. You see this as a sign and gently move your hand to her waist, caressing her body carefully. She doesn't seem to mind this and rests her head on your shoulder. There's no way for you to know this, but at least for a while, you've deafened her to her inner demons. You keep this up for a while, dancing to the sound of your heartbeats.
string:
你向瑟拉娜伸出手。她先是迟疑片刻，而后缓缓握住你的手，另一只手轻搭在你肩头。你恪守着分寸，也将另一只手放在她肩头而非腰间。她刻意保持着肢体距离，暂时避开目光交汇。你们渐渐开始起舞，纵然没有音乐指引步伐，却自然找到了属于彼此的节奏。你既因她的靠近而紧张，又担心这于她太过勉强。目光交汇的瞬间，你们同时移开了视线。
她的手缓缓地从你的肩头滑向背脊，身体也渐渐靠近。你将这视为信号，轻柔地环住她的腰肢，指尖细腻描摹她的身躯。她没有抗拒，反而将前额靠在你肩上。你无从知晓的是，至少在这一刻，你让她暂时忘却了内心深处困扰的恶魔。你们就这样相拥而舞，直到心跳的节拍渐渐重合。
